也可以用 YAML DataSet 来写这个留言本的例子：

Alternatively, you can use the <l0>@expectedException</l0>, <l1>@expectedExceptionCode</l1>, <l2>@expectedExceptionMessage</l2>, and <l3>@expectedExceptionMessageRegExp</l3> annotations to set up expectations for exceptions raised by the code under test. <x4/> shows an example.
此外，还可以用 <l0>@expectedException</l0>、<l1>@expectedExceptionCode</l1>、<l2>@expectedExceptionMessage</l2> 和 <l3>@expectedExceptionMessageRegExp</l3> 标注来建立对被测代码所抛异常的预期。<x4/> 展示了一个例子。
Alternatively, you can use the <l0>@test</l0> annotation in a method's docblock to mark it as a test method.
也可以在方法的文档注释块(docblock)中使用 <l0>@test</l0> 标注将其标记为测试方法。
Alternatively, you can use the <l0>setExpectedException()</l0> method to set the expected exception as shown in <x1/>.
此外，还可以用 <l0>setExpectedException()</l0> 方法来设定所预期的异常，如<x1/>所示。

Alternatively, you can use the static assertion methods provided by the <l0>PHPUnit_Framework_Assert</l0> class to write the contract conditions as design-by-contract style assertions into your code, as shown in <x1/>. When one of these assertions fails, an <l2>PHPUnit_Framework_AssertionFailedError</l2> exception will be raised. With this approach, you write less code for the contract condition checks and the tests become more readable. However, you add a runtime dependency on PHPUnit to your project.

另外，也可以用 <l0>PHPUnit_Framework_Assert</l0> 类所提供的静态断言方法来将契约条件以契约式设计的样式写入代码之中，如<x1/>中所示。如果这些断言之一失败，将会抛出 <l2>PHPUnit_Framework_AssertionFailedError</l2> 异常。通过这种方法，为检测契约条件所编写的代码就会更少，测试的可读性也会变得更好。不过这样就往项目中加入了对 PHPUnit 的运行时依赖。

Alternatively, you can write the stub yourself and improve your design along the way. Widely used resources are accessed through a single façade, so you can easily replace the resource with the stub. For example, instead of having direct database calls scattered throughout the code, you have a single <l0>Database</l0> object, an implementor of the <l1>IDatabase</l1> interface. Then, you can create a stub implementation of <l2>IDatabase</l2> and use it for your tests. You can even create an option for running the tests with the stub database or the real database, so you can use your tests for both local testing during development and integration testing with the real database.

另外，也可以自行编写桩件，并在此过程中改善设计。在系统中被广泛使用的资源是通过单个外观(facade)来访问的，因此很容易就能用桩件替换掉资源。例如，将散落在代码各处的对数据库的直接调用替换为单个 <l0>Database</l0> 对象，这个对象实现了 <l1>IDatabase</l1> 接口。接下来，就可以创建实现了 <l2>IDatabase</l2> 的桩件并在测试中使用之。甚至可以创建一个选项来控制是用桩件还是用真实数据库来运行测试，这样测试就既能在开发过程中用作本地测试，又能在实际数据库环境中进行集成测试。
Am I required to use PDO in my application for the Database Extension to work?
为了让数据库扩展模块正常工作，需要在应用程序中使用 PDO 吗？

An annotation is a special form of syntactic metadata that can be added to the source code of some programming languages. While PHP has no dedicated language feature for annotating source code, the usage of tags such as <l0>@annotation arguments</l0> in documentation block has been established in the PHP community to annotate source code. In PHP documentation blocks are reflective: they can be accessed through the Reflection API's <l1>getDocComment()</l1> method on the function, class, method, and attribute level. Applications such as PHPUnit use this information at runtime to configure their behaviour.

所谓标注，是指某些编程语言中允许加在源代码中的一种特殊格式的语法元数据。PHP 并没有专门的语言特性来支持对源代码进行标注，然而 PHP 社区早已经形成惯例，通过在文档注释块中使用诸如 <l0>@annotation arguments</l0> 这样的标签来为源代码加上标注。在 PHP 中，文档注释块是可反射的：可以对函数、方法、类以及属性调用相应级别的反射 API <l1>getDocComment()</l1> 方法来获取相应的文档注释块。诸如 PHPUnit 这样的应用程序在运行时用这些信息来配置其行为。
An array of column-names of the table, ordered by their appearance in the result-set.
表的列名数组，按照列在结果集中出现的顺序排列。
An array of the primary-key columns.
构成主键的列的数组。

An example of what code coverage statistics can mean is that if there is a method with 100 lines of code, and only 75 of these lines are actually executed when tests are being run, then the method is considered to have a code coverage of 75 percent.
关于代码覆盖率统计是什么意思，举个例子，假如有个方法有100行代码，而在测试运行过程中实际上只执行了其中的75行，那么这个方法就有75%的代码覆盖率。

Any attacker can create a public key and upload it to the public key servers. They can then create a malicious release signed by this fake key. Then, if you tried to verify the signature of this corrupt release, it would succeed because the key was not the "real" key. Therefore, you need to validate the authenticity of this key. Validating the authenticity of a public key, however, is outside the scope of this documentation.
任何攻击者都能创建公钥并将其上传到公钥服务器。他们可以建立一个带恶意的发行包，并用这个假密钥进行签名。这样，如果尝试对这个损坏了的发行包进行签名校验，由于密钥是“真”密钥，校验将成功完成。因此，需要对这个密钥的真实性进行校验。如何对公钥的真实性进行校验已经超出了本文档的范畴。

Any defined <l0><table></l0> has a name and requires a definition of all the columns with their names. It can contain zero or any positive number of nested <l1><row></l1> elements. Defining no <l2><row></l2> element means the table is empty. The <l3><value></l3> and <l4><null /></l4> tags have to be specified in the order of the previously given <l5><column></l5> elements. The <l6><null /></l6> tag obviously means that the value is NULL.

所定义的每个 <l0><table></l0> 都有一个名称，并且必须有对所有列及其名称的定义。其下可以包含零个或任意正整数个 <l1><row></l1> 元素。没有定义 <l2><row></l2> 意味着这是个空表。<l3><value></l3> 和 <l4><null /></l4> 标签必须按照之前给定 <l5><column></l5> 元素的顺序来指定。<l6><null /></l6> 标签显然意味着这个值为 NULL。

At this point, the signature is good, but we don't trust this key. A good signature means that the file has not been tampered. However, due to the nature of public key cryptography, you need to additionally verify that key <l0>6372C20A</l0> was created by the real Sebastian Bergmann.
此时，签名已经没问题了，但是这个公钥还不能信任。签名没问题意味着文件未被篡改。可是由于公钥加密系统的性质，还需要再校验密钥 <l0>6372C20A</l0> 确实是由真正的 Sebastian Bergmann 创建的。

By default, PHPUnit converts PHP errors, warnings, and notices that are triggered during the execution of a test to an exception. Using these exceptions, you can, for instance, expect a test to trigger a PHP error as shown in <x0/>.
默认情况下，PHPUnit 将测试在执行中触发的 PHP 错误、警告、通知都转换为异常。利用这些异常，就可以，比如说，预期测试将触发 PHP 错误，如<x0/>所示。

By default, PHPUnit runs your tests in a way where changes to global and super-global variables (<l0>$GLOBALS</l0>, <l1>$_ENV</l1>, <l2>$_POST</l2>, <l3>$_GET</l3>, <l4>$_COOKIE</l4>, <l5>$_SERVER</l5>, <l6>$_FILES</l6>, <l7>$_REQUEST</l7>) do not affect other tests. Optionally, this isolation can be extended to static attributes of classes.

默认情况下，PHPUnit 用一种更改全局变量与超全局变量(<l0>$GLOBALS</l0>、<l1>$_ENV</l1>、<l2>$_POST</l2>、<l3>$_GET</l3>、<l4>$_COOKIE</l4>、<l5>$_SERVER</l5>、<l6>$_FILES</l6>、<l7>$_REQUEST</l7>)不会影响到其他测试的方式来运行所有测试。同时，还可以选择将这种隔离扩展到类的静态属性。
By default, PHPUnit will install an error handler that converts the following errors to exceptions:
默认情况下，PHPUnit 将会安插一个错误处理函数来将以下错误转换为异常：
By default, a <e0>blacklist</e0> is used to exclude files from the code coverage report. This blacklist is pre-filled with the source files of PHPUnit and its dependencies.
默认情况下，在生成代码覆盖率报告时会应用一个特定的<e0>黑名单</e0>来排除某些文件。这个黑名单中包含了 PHPUnit 本身及其所依赖的所有组件的相应源文件。
By default, all methods of the given class are replaced with a test double that just returns <l0>NULL</l0> unless a return value is configured using <l1>will($this->returnValue())</l1>, for instance.
默认情况下，给定类的所有方法都会替换为只会返回 <l0>NULL</l0> 的测试替身，除非用 <l1>will($this->returnValue())</l1> 之类的方法配置了测试替身的返回值。

By default, all methods of the original class are replaced with a dummy implementation that just returns <l0>NULL</l0> (without calling the original method). Using the <l1>will($this->returnValue())</l1> method, for instance, you can configure these dummy implementations to return a value when called.
在默认情况下，原始类的所有方法都会被替换为只会返回 <l0>NULL</l0> 伪实现（其中不会调用原版方法）。使用诸如 <l1>will($this->returnValue())</l1> 之类的方法可以对这些山寨实现在被调用时应当返回什么值做出配置。

By default, all methods of the original class are replaced with a dummy implementation that just returns <l0>null</l0> (without calling the original method). Using the <l1>will($this->returnValue())</l1> method, for instance, you can configure these dummy implementations to return a value when called.
在默认情况下，原版类的所有方法都会被替换为只会返回 <l0>null</l0> 的伪实现（其中不会调用原版方法）。使用诸如 <l1>will($this->returnValue())</l1> 之类的方法可以对这些伪实现在被调用时应当返回什么值做出配置。
By default, all source files that contain at least one line of code that has been executed (and only these files) are included in the code coverage report.
默认情况下，代码覆盖率报告中包含（且只包括）所有内含至少一行已执行代码的源文件。

By default, all sourcecode files that contain at least one line of code that has been executed (and only these files) are included in the report. The sourcecode files that are included in the report can be filtered by using a blacklist or a whitelist approach.
默认情况下，报告中包括（且只包括）所有包含至少一行已被执行的代码的源代码文件。可以通过黑名单或者白名单来对报告中包含哪些源代码文件进行过滤。

By default, all tests are considered to be small if they are not marked as <l0>@medium</l0> or <l1>@large</l1>. Please note, however, that <l2>--group</l2> and the related options will only consider a test to be in the <l3>small</l3> group if it is explicitly marked with the appropriate annotation.
默认情况下，所有未标记为 <l0>@medium</l0> 或 <l1>@large</l1> 的测试都视为小型(small)测试。请注意，虽然如此，<l2>--group</l2> 和有关的选项都只会将用恰当的标注显式标记好的测试视为在 <l3>small</l3> 组中。

By using stubs (see the chapter on "Mock Objects", earlier in this book), you can further decouple yourself from the supplier: The job of the supplier is to make the tests run with the real implementation of the package. Your job is to make the tests run for your own code. Until such time as you have the real implementation of the supplied package, you use stub objects. Following this approach, the two teams can develop independently.
通过使用桩件（参见本书前面关于“仿件对象”的那一章），你可以更好的与供应商解耦：供应商的工作就是让测试能够运行于包的实际实现上；你的工作则是让测试能够运行于你自己的代码上。在你拿到包的实际实现前，使用桩件对象。通过这种方式，两个团队可以互相独立的进行开发。

By writing the contract conditions into the tests, we have used Design-by-Contract to program the <l0>BankAccount</l0> class. We then wrote, following the Test-First Programming approach, the code needed to make the tests pass. However, we forgot to write tests that call <l1>setBalance()</l1>, <l2>depositMoney()</l2>, and <l3>withdrawMoney()</l3> with legal values that do not violate the contract conditions. We need a means to test our tests or at least to measure their quality. Such a means is the analysis of code-coverage information that we will discuss next.

通过将契约条件写入测试，我们使用契约式设计编制了 <l0>BankAccount</l0> 类。随后我们遵照测试优先编程方法编写了让测试能通过的代码。然而，我们忘了编写以不会违背契约条件的合法值调用 <l1>setBalance()</l1>、<l2>depositMoney()</l2> 和 <l3>withdrawMoney()</l3> 的测试。我们需要一种手段来测试我们的测试，或者至少是衡量它们的质量。这种方法就是代码覆盖率信息分析，接下来我们将要对它进行讨论。

Constraint
约束条件
Constraint that accepts any input value.
此约束接受任意输入值。
Constraint that applies another constraint to an attribute of a class or an object.
此约束将另外一个约束应用于某个类或对象的某个属性。
Constraint that asserts that one value is identical to another.
此约束断言所评定的值与另外一个值全等。
Constraint that asserts that the <l0>array</l0> or object that implements the <l1>Iterator</l1> interface it is evaluated for contains a given value.
此约束断言所评定的 <l0>array</l0> 或实现了 <l1>Iterator</l1> 接口的对象包含有给定值。
Constraint that asserts that the <l0>array</l0> or object that implements the <l1>Iterator</l1> interface it is evaluated for contains only instances of a given classname.
此约束断言所评定的 <l0>array</l0> 或实现了 <l1>Iterator</l1> 接口的对象仅包含给定类名的类的实例。
Constraint that asserts that the <l0>array</l0> or object that implements the <l1>Iterator</l1> interface it is evaluated for contains only values of a given type.
此约束断言所评定的 <l0>array</l0> 或实现了 <l1>Iterator</l1> 接口的对象仅包含给定类型的值。
Constraint that asserts that the array it is evaluated for has a given key.
此约束断言所评定的数组拥有指定键名。
Constraint that asserts that the class it is evaluated for has a given attribute.
此约束断言所评定的类具有给定属性。
Constraint that asserts that the class it is evaluated for has a given static attribute.
此约束断言所评定的类具有给定静态属性。
Constraint that asserts that the object it is evaluated for has a given attribute.
此约束断言所评定的对象具有给定属性。
Constraint that asserts that the object it is evaluated for is an instance of a given class.
此约束断言所评定的对象是给定类的实例。
Constraint that asserts that the string it is evaluated for contains a given string.
此约束断言所评定的字符串包含指定字符串。
Constraint that asserts that the string it is evaluated for ends with a given suffix.
此约束断言所评定的字符串以给定后缀结尾。
Constraint that asserts that the string it is evaluated for matches a regular expression.
此约束断言所评定的字符串匹配于正则表达式。
Constraint that asserts that the string it is evaluated for starts with a given prefix.
此约束断言所评定的字符串以给定前缀开头。
Constraint that asserts that the value it is evaluated for is greater than a given value.
此约束断言所评定的值大于给定值。
Constraint that asserts that the value it is evaluated for is greater than or equal to a given value.
此约束断言所评定的值大于或等于给定值。
Constraint that asserts that the value it is evaluated for is of a specified type.
此约束断言所评定的值是指定类型的。
Constraint that asserts that the value it is evaluated for is smaller than a given value.
此约束断言所评定的值小于给定值。
Constraint that asserts that the value it is evaluated for is smaller than or equal to a given value.
此约束断言所评定的值小于或等于给定值。
Constraint that asserts that the value it is evaluated is <l0>FALSE</l0>.
此约束断言所评定的值为 <l0>FALSE</l0>。
Constraint that asserts that the value it is evaluated is <l0>NULL</l0>.
此约束断言所评定的值为 <l0>NULL</l0>。
Constraint that asserts that the value it is evaluated is <l0>TRUE</l0>.
此约束断言所评定的值为 <l0>TRUE</l0>。
Constraint that checks if a value is equal to an attribute of a class or of an object.
此约束检验一个值是否等于某个类或对象的某个属性。
Constraint that checks if one value is equal to another.
此约束检验一个值是否等于另外一个。
Constraint that checks if the file(name) that it is evaluated for exists.
此约束检验所评定的文件名对应的文件是否存在。

Depending on the implementation different approaches are taken to add table instances to a dataset. For example, tables are added internally during construction from the source file in all file-based datasets such as <l0>YamlDataSet</l0>, <l1>XmlDataSet</l1> or <l2>FlatXmlDataSet</l2>.

During Fixture SetUp PHPUnit's Database Extension inserts the rows into the database in the order they are specified in your fixture. If your database schema uses foreign keys this means you have to specify the tables in an order that does not cause foreign key constraints to fail.

Even good programmers make mistakes. The difference between a good programmer and a bad programmer is that the good programmer uses tests to detect mistakes as soon as possible. The sooner you test for a mistake the greater your chance of finding it and the less it will cost to find and fix. This explains why leaving testing until just before releasing software is so problematic. Most errors do not get caught at all, and the cost of fixing the ones you do catch is so high that you have to perform triage with the errors because you just cannot afford to fix them all.
再好的程序员也会犯错。好程序员不同于差程序员之处在于他们通过测试来尽早发现错误。测试进行的越早，发现错误的机会就越大，发现和修正的代价就越小。因此临近软件发布才进行测试是很有问题的做法。大多数错误都未能发现，而已发现的那些错误，修正它们的代价实在太大，于是根本不可能把它们全部修复，只能挑着处理其中的一部分。

Find the smallest-scale demonstration of the defect in the code. For example, if a number appears incorrectly in an output, find the object that is computing that number.
在代码中寻找此缺陷的最小规模表达。例如，如果在输出中有一个数字看起来不对，那么就寻找算出此数字的那个对象。

Finding the smallest reliable reproduction of the defect gives you the opportunity to really examine the cause of the defect. The test you write will improve the chances that when you fix the defect, you really fix it, because the new test reduces the likelihood of undoing the fix with future code changes. All the tests you wrote before reduce the likelihood of inadvertently causing a different problem.
寻找缺陷的最小可靠重现使你有机会去真正检查缺陷的原因。当修复了缺陷之后，所编写的测试则有助于提高缺陷真正被修复的几率，因为新加入的测试降低了未来修改代码时又破坏此修复的可能性。而之前所编写的所有测试则降低了在不经意间导致其他问题的可能性。

From Selenium 1.1.1, an experimental feature is included allowing the user to share the session between tests. The only supported case is to share the session between all tests when a single browser is used. Call <l0>PHPUnit_Extensions_SeleniumTestCase::shareSession(true)</l0> in your bootstrap file to enable session sharing. The session will be reset in the case of not successul tests (failed or incomplete); it is up to the user to avoid interactions between tests by resetting cookies or logging out from the application under test (with a tearDown() method).

从 Selenium 1.1.1 开始，包含了一个实验性的特性，允许用户在不同测试之间共享会话(session)。唯一支持的情况是当使用单个浏览器时在所有测试间共享会话。在初始启动(bootstrap)文件中调用 <l0>PHPUnit_Extensions_SeleniumTestCase::shareSession(true)</l0> 来启用会话共享。在碰到不成功的测试（失败或不完整）时会话将会重置；用户自行决定如何避免测试之间的互动，可以重设 cookies 或者从被测应用程序登出（通过 tearDown() 方法）。

Human readable code coverage output for the command-line or a text file. The aim of this output format is to provide a quick coverage overview while working on a small set of classes. For bigger projects this output can be useful to get an quick overview of the projects coverage or when used with the <l0>--filter</l0> functionality. When used from the command-line by writing to <l1>php://stdout</l1> this will honor the <l2>--colors</l2> setting. Writing to standard out is the default option when used from the command-line. By default this will only show files that have at least one covered line. This can only be changed via the <l3>showUncoveredFiles</l3> xml configuration option. See <x4/>.

以易于常人了解(human-readable)的格式生成代码覆盖率，输出到命令行或保存成文本文件。这个输出格式旨在为工作于少量类时提供快捷的覆盖情况概览。对于更大的项目，这个输出有助于对项目的覆盖情况有一个快速的概览，或者配合 <l0>--filter</l0> 功能使用也会很有用。若从命令行调用并且写入到 <l1>php://stdout</l1>，<l2>--colors</l2> 设置会非常好用。从命令行调用时，写入到标准输出是默认选项。默认情况下，只会显示至少有一行被覆盖的文件。这只能通过 <l3>showUncoveredFiles</l3> XML 配置选项来改变。参见<x4/>。

Human readable code coverage output for the command-line or a text file. The aim of this output format is to provide a quick coverage overview while working on a small set of classes. For bigger projects this output can be useful to get an quick overview of the projects coverage or when used with the <l0>--filter</l0> functionality. When used from the command-line by writing to <l1>php://stdout</l1> this will honor the <l2>--colors</l2> setting. Writing to standard out is the default option when used from the command-line. By default this will only show files that have at least one covered line. This can only be changed via the <l3>showUncoveredFiles</l3> xml configuration option. See <x4/>. By default all files and their coverage status are shown in the detailed report. This can be changed via the <l5>showOnlySummary</l5> xml configuration option.

以易于常人了解(human-readable)的格式生成代码覆盖率，输出到命令行或保存成文本文件。这个输出格式旨在为工作于少量类时提供快捷的覆盖情况概览。对于更大的项目，这个输出有助于对项目的覆盖情况有一个快速的概览，或者配合 <l0>--filter</l0> 功能使用也会很有用。若从命令行调用并且写入到 <l1>php://stdout</l1>，<l2>--colors</l2> 设置会非常好用。从命令行调用时，写入到标准输出是默认选项。默认情况下，只会显示至少有一行被覆盖的文件。这只能通过 XML 配置选项 <l3>showUncoveredFiles</l3> 来改变。参见 <x4/>。默认情况下，在详细报告中会显示所有文件以及它们的覆盖情况。这可以通过 XML 配置选项 <l5>showOnlySummary</l5> 来改变。.

If <f0>phpunit.xml</f0> or <f1>phpunit.xml.dist</f1> (in that order) exist in the current working directory and <l2>--configuration</l2> is <e3>not</e3> used, the configuration will be automatically read from that file.
如果 <f0>phpunit.xml</f0> 或 <f1>phpunit.xml.dist</f1> （按此顺序）存在于当前工作目录并且<e3>未</e3>使用 <l2>--configuration</l2>，将自动从此文件中读取配置。

If a test changes the current working directory (<l0>cwd</l0>) PHPUnit ran into issues when generating code coverage output. Now that the cwd is restored after each test case you might find that one of your tests depended on another test changing the cwd. Something that isn't desirable anyways and should be easy to fix.
如果某个测试改变了当前工作目录(<l0>cwd</l0>)，PHPUnit 在生成代码覆盖率报告时会碰到问题。现在当前工作目录将会在每个测试用例之后还原，于是可能会发现某个测试依赖于另外一个改变了当前工作目录的测试。这是不可取的，并且应当很容易修正。
If it's hard to learn how to write tests, developers will not learn to write them.
如果很难学会如何编写测试，那么开发者们就不会去学。
If provided, only the code coverage information for the specified method(s) will be considered.
如果提供了此标注，则代码覆盖率信息中只考虑指定的这些方法。
If tests are not easy to write, developers will not write them.
如果测试不容易编写，开发者们就不会去写。

If the <l0>PHP_Invoker</l0> package is installed and strict mode is enabled, a large test will fail if it takes longer than 60 seconds to execute. This timeout is configurable via the <l1>timeoutForLargeTests</l1> attribute in the XML configuration file.
如果安装了 <l0>PHP_Invoker</l0> 组件包并启用了严格模式，一个执行时间超过60秒的大型(large)测试将视为失败。这个超时限制可以通过 XML 配置文件的 <l1>timeoutForLargeTests</l1> 属性进行配置。

If the <l0>PHP_Invoker</l0> package is installed and strict mode is enabled, a medium test will fail if it takes longer than 10 seconds to execute. This timeout is configurable via the <l1>timeoutForMediumTests</l1> attribute in the XML configuration file.
如果安装了 <l0>PHP_Invoker</l0> 组件包并启用了严格模式，一个执行时间超过10秒的中型(medium)测试将视为失败。这个超时限制可以通过 XML 配置文件的 <l1>timeoutForMediumTests</l1> 属性进行配置。

If the <l0>PHP_Invoker</l0> package is installed and strict mode is enabled, a small test will fail if it takes longer than 1 second to execute. This timeout is configurable via the <l1>timeoutForSmallTests</l1> attribute in the XML configuration file.
如果安装了 <l0>PHP_Invoker</l0> 组件包并启用了严格模式，一个执行时间超过1秒的小型(small)测试将会视为失败。这个超时限制可以通过 XML 配置文件的 <l1>timeoutForSmallTests</l1> 属性进行配置。

If the <l0>PHP_Invoker</l0> package is installed and strict mode is enabled, this attribute sets the timeout for all tests marked as <l1>@large</l1>. If a test does not complete within this configured timeout, it will fail.
如果安装了 <l0>PHP_Invoker</l0> 组件包并启用了严格模式，此属性为所有标记为 <l1>@large</l1> 的测试设定超时限制。如果测试未能在这个配置所指定的超时限制时间内完成，即视为失败。

If the <l0>PHP_Invoker</l0> package is installed and strict mode is enabled, this attribute sets the timeout for all tests marked as <l1>@medium</l1>. If a test does not complete within this configured timeout, it will fail.
如果安装了 <l0>PHP_Invoker</l0> 组件包并启用了严格模式，此属性为所有标记为 <l1>@medium</l1> 的测试设定超时限制。如果测试未能在这个配置所指定的超时限制时间内完成，即视为失败。

If the <l0>PHP_Invoker</l0> package is installed and strict mode is enabled, this attribute sets the timeout for all tests not marked as <l1>@medium</l1> or <l2>@large</l2>. If a test does not complete within this configured timeout, it will fail.
如果安装了 <l0>PHP_Invoker</l0> 组件包并启用了严格模式，此属性为所有未标记为 <l1>@medium</l1> 或 <l2>@large</l2>的测试设定超时限制。如果测试未能在这个配置所指定的超时限制时间内完成，即视为失败。
If the <l0>PHP_Invoker</l0> package is installed:
如果安装了 <l0>PHP_Invoker</l0> 组件包：
If the <l0>setUp()</l0> code differs only slightly, move the code that differs from the <l1>setUp()</l1> code to the test method.
如果两个 <l0>setUp()</l0> 代码仅有微小差异，把有差异的代码内容从 <l1>setUp()</l1> 移到测试方法内。
If the <u0>Suhosin</u0> extension is enabled, you need to allow execution of PHARs in your <l1>php.ini</l1>:
如果启用了 <u0>Suhosin</u0> 扩展，需要在 <l1>php.ini</l1> 中允许执行 PHAR：

If the code that is expected to raise an exception in <x0/> does not raise the expected exception, the subsequent call to <l1>fail()</l1> will halt the test and signal a problem with the test. If the expected exception is raised, the <l2>catch</l2> block will be executed, and the test will end successfully.
当<x0/> 中预期会引发异常的代码并没有引发异常时，后面对 <l1>fail()</l1> 的调用将会中止测试，并通告测试有问题。如果预期的异常出现了，将执行 <l2>catch</l2> 代码块，测试将会成功结束。
If the original class does declare a method named "method" then <l0>$stub->expects($this->any())->method('doSomething')->willReturn('foo');</l0> has to be used.
如果原始类包含名为“method”的方法，就必须用 <l0>$stub->expects($this->any())->method('doSomething')->willReturn('foo');</l0>。
If time limits based on test size are enforced then this attribute sets the timeout for all tests marked as <l0>@large</l0>. If a test does not complete within its configured timeout, it will fail.
如果实行了基于测试规模的时间限制，那么此属性为所有标记为 <l0>@large</l0> 的测试设定超时限制。在配置的时间限制内未执行完毕的测试将视为失败。
If time limits based on test size are enforced then this attribute sets the timeout for all tests marked as <l0>@medium</l0>. If a test does not complete within its configured timeout, it will fail.
如果实行了基于测试规模的时间限制，那么此属性为所有标记为 <l0>@medium</l0> 的测试设定超时限制。在配置的时间限制内未执行完毕的测试将视为失败。

If time limits based on test size are enforced then this attribute sets the timeout for all tests not marked as <l0>@medium</l0> or <l1>@large</l1>. If a test does not complete within its configured timeout, it will fail.
如果实行了基于测试规模的时间限制，那么此属性为所有未标记为 <l0>@medium</l0> 或 <l1>@large</l1> 的测试设定超时限制。在配置的时间限制内未执行完毕的测试将视为失败。

If we think of a successful test as a green light and a test failure as a red light, we need an additional yellow light to mark a test as being incomplete or not yet implemented. <l0>PHPUnit_Framework_IncompleteTest</l0> is a marker interface for marking an exception that is raised by a test method as the result of the test being incomplete or currently not implemented. <l1>PHPUnit_Framework_IncompleteTestError</l1> is the standard implementation of this interface.
假如把成功的测试视为绿灯、测试失败视为红灯，那么还额外需要黄灯来将测试标记为未完成或尚未实现。<l0>PHPUnit_Framework_IncompleteTest</l0> 是一个标记接口，用于将测试方法抛出的异常标记为测试未完成或目前尚未实现而导致的结果。<l1>PHPUnit_Framework_IncompleteTestError</l1> 是这个接口的标准实现。
If you are using a persistent database (not Sqlite Memory) you can easily setup the database once with tools such as phpMyAdmin for MySQL and re-use the database for every test-run.
如果使用的是持久化数据库(不是 Sqlite Memory)，可以很轻松地用 phpMyAdmin（针对MySQL）之类的工具来一次性建立数据库，并在每个测试中复用这个数据库。

If you are using libraries such as <u0>Doctrine 2</u0> or <u1>Propel</u1> you can use their APIs to create the database schema you need once before you run the tests. You can utilize <u2>PHPUnit's Bootstrap and Configuration</u2> capabilities to execute this code whenever your tests are run.
如果使用的是诸如 <u0>Doctrine 2</u0> 或 <u1>Propel</u1> 这样的库，可以用它们的API来在测试运行前一次性建立所需的数据库。可以利用 <u2>PHPUnit 的引导和配置</u2> 功能来在每次测试运行时执行这些代码。
If you are using syntax that doesn't compile with a certain PHP Version look into the xml configuration for version dependent includes in
如果使用了某种在特定版本的 PHP 下无法编译的语法，请在此章节内查找 XML 配置信息中关于版本依赖的信息：

If you do not cache the PDO instance that is created from the TestCase <l0>getConnection()</l0> method the number of connections to the database is increasing by one or more with each database test. With default configuration MySql only allows 100 concurrent connections other vendors also have maximum connection limits.
如果没有对 TestCase 中 <l0>getConnection()</l0> 方法所创建 PDO 实例进行缓存，那么每个数据库测试都会增加一个或多个数据库连接。MySQL的默认配置只允许100个并发连接，其他供应商的数据库也都有各自的最大连接限制。

If you have a large fixture file you can use the DataSet Filter for white- and blacklisting of tables and columns that should be contained in a sub-dataset. This is especially handy in combination with the DB DataSet to filter the columns of the datasets.
如果有一个非常大的基境文件，可以用数据集筛选器来为需要包含在子数据集中的表和列指定白/黑名单。与 DB DataSet 联用来对数据集中的列进行筛选尤其方便。
If you point the PHPUnit command-line test runner to a directory it will look for <f0>*Test.php</f0> files.
当 PHPUnit 命令行测试执行器指向一个目录时，它会在目录下查找 <f0>*Test.php</f0> 文件。
If you really have a different <l0>setUp()</l0>, you need a different test case class. Name the class after the difference in the setup.
如果两个 <l0>setUp()</l0> 是确实不一样，那么需要另外一个测试用例类。参考基境建立工作的不同之处来命名这个类。

If you want the results of one test to have no effect on the results of another test, each test should create the full state of the world before it begins to execute and return the world to its original state when it finishes. However, setting up the world can take a long time: for example connecting to a database and initializing it to a known state using realistic data.
如果想要单个测试的结果不会影响其他测试，那么每个测试都需要在运行前创建完整的运行场景，并在运行结束后将所有状态复原。但是，建立场景可能需要很长时间：例如连接数据库并用实际数据将其初始化为已知状态。

If you want to test code that works with the Database Extension the setup is a bit more complex and you have to extend a different abstract TestCase requiring you to implement two abstract methods <l0>getConnection()</l0> and <l1>getDataSet()</l1>:
如果测试代码用到了数据库扩展模块，那么建立的过程就会更复杂一些，需要扩展另一个抽象 TestCase 类，它要求实现两个抽象方法，<l0>getConnection()</l0> 和 <l1>getDataSet()</l1>：
If your project is smaller or you have enough memory you will get a runtime benefit by adding <l0>cacheTokens="true"</l0> to your <l1>phpunit.xml</l1> file. See <x2/>.
如果项目比较小或者有足够多内存，可以通过在 <l1>phpunit.xml</l1> 文件中添加 <l0>cacheTokens="true"</l0> 来获得运行时间上的收益。参见<x2/>。
Ignore <f0>phpunit.xml</f0> and <f1>phpunit.xml.dist</f1> from the current working directory.
忽略当前工作目录下的 <f0>phpunit.xml</f0> 与 <f1>phpunit.xml.dist</f1>。
Ignoring Code Blocks
略过代码块
Implement PHPUnit_Framework_Test
实现 PHPUnit_Framework_Test
Implement PHPUnit_Framework_TestListener
实现 PHPUnit_Framework_TestListener
Implementing getConnection()
实现 getConnection()
Implementing getDataSet()
实现 getDataSet()
Implementing your own DataSets/DataTables
实现自有的 DataSet/DataTable

In <x0/> we used the producer-consumer relationship between tests to share a fixture. This is not always desired or even possible. <x1/> shows how we can write the tests of the <l2>StackTest</l2> in such a way that not the fixture itself is reused but the code that creates it. First we declare the instance variable, <l3>$stack</l3>, that we are going to use instead of a method-local variable. Then we put the creation of the <l4>array</l4> fixture into the <l5>setUp()</l5> method. Finally, we remove the redundant code from the test methods and use the newly introduced instance variable, <l6>$this->stack</l6>, instead of the method-local variable <l7>$stack</l7> with the <l8>assertEquals()</l8> assertion method.

在<x0/>中，我们在测试之间运用生产者-消费者关系来共享基境。这并非总是预期的方式，甚至有时是不可能的。<x1/>展示了另外一个编写测试 <l2>StackTest</l2> 的方式。在这个方式中，不再重用基境本身，而是重用建立基境的代码。首先声明一个实例变量，<l3>$stack</l3>，用来替代方法内的局部变量。然后把 <l4>array</l4> 基境的建立放到 <l5>setUp()</l5> 方法中。最后，从测试方法中去除冗余代码，在 <l8>assertEquals()</l8> 断言方法中使用新引入的实例变量 <l6>$this->stack</l6>替代方法内的局部变量 <l7>$stack</l7>。
In <x0/> you can see how to configure PHPUnit to attach your test listener to the test execution.
在<x0/>中可以看到如何配置 PHPUnit 来将测试监听器附加到测试执行过程上。
In <x0/>, Dave Astels makes the following points:
在<x0/>中，, Dave Astels 提出了以下几点：

In <x0/>, the fixture was simply the array that is stored in the <l1>$stack</l1> variable. Most of the time, though, the fixture will be more complex than a simple array, and the amount of code needed to set it up will grow accordingly. The actual content of the test gets lost in the noise of setting up the fixture. This problem gets even worse when you write several tests with similar fixtures. Without some help from the testing framework, we would have to duplicate the code that sets up the fixture for each test we write.
在<x0/>中，基境十分简单，就是存储在 <l1>$stack</l1> 变量中的数组。然而，绝大多数时候基境均远比一个简单数组要复杂，用于建立基境的代码量也会随之增长。测试的真正内容就被淹没于建立基境带来的干扰中。当编写多个需要类似基境的测试时这个问题就变得更糟糕了。如果没有来自于测试框架的帮助，就不得不在写每一个测试时都将建立基境的代码重复一次。
In PHP, global variables work like this:
在 PHP 中，全局变量是这样运作的：

In addition to the <l0>expectException()</l0> method the <l1>expectExceptionCode()</l1>, <l2>expectExceptionMessage()</l2>, and <l3>expectExceptionMessageRegExp()</l3> methods exist to set up expectations for exceptions raised by the code under test.
在建立对被测代码所抛异常的预期时，除了 <l0>expectException()</l0> 方法，还存在 <l1>expectExceptionCode()</l1>、<l2>expectExceptionMessage()</l2> 和 <l3>expectExceptionMessageRegExp()</l3> 方法可用。
In addition to the above methods it is also possible to use the <l0>@requires</l0> annotation to express common preconditions for a test case.
除了上述方法，还可以用 <l0>@requires</l0> 标注来表达测试用例的一些常见前提条件。

In addition, the <l0>setUpBeforeClass()</l0> and <l1>tearDownAfterClass()</l1> template methods are called before the first test of the test case class is run and after the last test of the test case class is run, respectively.
另外，<l0>setUpBeforeClass()</l0> 与 <l1>tearDownAfterClass()</l1> 模板方法将分别在测试用例类的第一个测试运行之前和测试用例类的最后一个测试运行之后调用。

In computer science, code coverage is a measure used to describe the degree to which the source code of a program is tested by a particular test suite. A program with high code coverage has been more thoroughly tested and has a lower chance of containing software bugs than a program with low code coverage.
计算机科学中所说的代码覆盖率是一种用于衡量特定测试套件对程序源代码测试程度的指标。拥有高代码覆盖率的程序相较于低代码低概率的程序而言测试的更加彻底、包含软件 bug 的可能性更低。
In conclusion I can only advise using the Flat XML datasets if you do not need NULL values.
总的来说，建议只在不需要 NULL 值的情况下使用 Flat XML Dataset。
In each frame the player has two opportunities to knock down 10 pins.
每一轮有两次投球机会来将10个球瓶击倒。
In his book on xUnit Test Patterns Gerard Meszaros lists the four stages of a unit-test:
Gerard Meszaros 在他的书《xUnit 测试模式》中列出了单元测试的四个阶段：
In the <l0>setUp()</l0> and <l1>tearDown()</l1> methods we have to ensure that the directory does not exist before and after the test.
在 <l0>setUp()</l0> 和 <l1>tearDown()</l1> 方法中，必须确保这个目录在测试前和测试后均不存在。

In the example above, the first test, <l0>testEmpty()</l0>, creates a new array and asserts that it is empty. The test then returns the fixture as its result. The second test, <l1>testPush()</l1>, depends on <l2>testEmpty()</l2> and is passed the result of that depended-upon test as its argument. Finally, <l3>testPop()</l3> depends upon <l4>testPush()</l4>.
在上例中，第一个测试， <l0>testEmpty()</l0>，创建了一个新数组，并断言其为空。随后，此测试将此基境作为结果返回。第二个测试，<l1>testPush()</l1>，依赖于 <l2>testEmpty()</l2> ，并将所依赖的测试之结果作为参数传入。最后，<l3>testPop()</l3> 依赖于 <l4>testPush()</l4>。

In the examples so far we have been returning simple values using <l0>willReturn($value)</l0>. This short syntax is the same as <l1>will($this->returnValue($value))</l1>. We can use variations on this longer syntax to achieve more complex stubbing behaviour.
在之前的例子中，用 <l0>willReturn($value)</l0> 返回简单值。这个简短的语法相当于 <l1>will($this->returnValue($value))</l1>。而在这个长点的语法中，可以使用变量，从而实现更复杂的上桩行为。

In the previous example we create an in-memory Sqlite connection and pass it to the <l0>createDefaultDBConnection</l0> method which wraps the PDO instance and the second parameter (the database-name) in a very simple abstraction layer for database connections of the type <l1>PHPUnit_Extensions_Database_DB_IDatabaseConnection</l1>.
在之前的例子里，我们在内存中创建 Sqlite 数据库并建立了连接，将此连接传递给 <l0>createDefaultDBConnection</l0> 方法，这个方法将 PDO 实例和第二参数（数据库名）包装在一个非常简单的数据库连接抽象层中，这个抽象层的类型是 <l1>PHPUnit_Extensions_Database_DB_IDatabaseConnection</l1>。

In the scope of a function or method, you may access the global variable <l0>$foo</l0> by either directly accessing <l1>$GLOBALS['foo']</l1> or by using <l2>global $foo;</l2> to create a local variable with a reference to the global variable.
在函数或者方法的变量作用域中，要访问全局变量 <l0>$foo</l0>，可以直接访问 <l1>$GLOBALS['foo']</l1>，或者用 <l2>global $foo;</l2> 来创建一个引用全局变量的局部变量。

In this case the second entry is posted anonymously. However this leads to a serious problem with column recognition. During dataset equality assertions each dataset has to specify what columns a table holds. If an attribute is NULL for all the rows of a data-table, how would the Database Extension know that the column should be part of the table?
在这个例子里第二个条目是匿名发表的。但是这为列的识别带来了一个非常严重的问题。在数据集相等断言的判定过程中，每个数据集都需要指明每个表拥有哪些列。如果有一个列在数据表的所有行里其值都是 NULL，那么数据库扩展模块又该从何得知表中包含这个列呢？

In this case the second entry is posted anonymously. However, this leads to a serious problem with column recognition. During dataset equality assertions each dataset has to specify what columns a table holds. If an attribute is NULL for all the rows of a data-table, how would the Database Extension know that the column should be part of the table?
在这个例子里第二个条目是匿名发表的。但是这为列的识别带来了一个非常严重的问题。在数据集相等断言的判定过程中，每个数据集都需要指明每个表拥有哪些列。如果有一个列在数据表的所有行里其值都是 NULL，那么数据库扩展模块又该从何得知表中包含这个列呢？

In this chapter we will go from simple <l0>print</l0>-based testing code to a fully automated test. Imagine that we have been asked to test PHP's built-in <l1>array</l1>. One bit of functionality to test is the function <l2>count()</l2>. For a newly created array we expect the <l3>count()</l3> function to return <l4>0</l4>. After we add an element, <l5>count()</l5> should return <l6>1</l6>. <x7/> shows what we want to test.

在本章中，我们将从基于 <l0>print</l0> 的简单测试代码开始，逐步前进至完全自动化的测试。假设我们需要对 PHP 内建的 <l1>array</l1> 进行测试。其中一个要测试的功能是 <l2>count()</l2> 函数。对于新建立的数组，我们预期 <l3>count()</l3> 函数将返回 <l4>0</l4>。添加一个元素之后，<l5>count()</l5> 函数应当返回 <l6>1</l6>。<x7/>展示了我们要测试的东西。

In this chapter you will learn all about PHPUnit's code coverage functionality that provides an insight into what parts of the production code are executed when the tests are run. It helps answering questions such as:
在本章中，你将学到 PHPUnit 代码覆盖率功能的一切。这个功能能洞察测试运行过程中执行了生产代码的哪些部分。他能够帮助回答诸如这些问题：

In this chapter you will learn all about PHPUnit's code coverage functionality that provides an insight into what parts of the production code are executed when the tests are run. It makes use of the <u0>PHP_CodeCoverage</u0> component, which in turn leverages the code coverage functionality provided by the <u1>Xdebug</u1> extension for PHP.
在本章中，你将学到 PHPUnit 中与代码覆盖率相关的一切功能。通过这部分功能，能够了解在测试运行过程中执行了生产代码的哪些部分。它使用了 <u0>PHP_CodeCoverage</u0> 组件，而这个组件又使用了 PHP 的 <u1>Xdebug</u1> 扩展所提供的代码覆盖率功能。
In this example only one of the array values differs and the other values are shown to provide context on where the error occurred.
在这个例子中，数组中只有一个值不同，但其他值也都同时显示出来，以提供关于错误发生的位置的上下文信息。
In this example the difference in the first index between <l0>1</l0> and <l1>'1'</l1> is reported even so assertEquals considers the values as a match.
在这个例子中，第一个索引项中的 <l0>1</l0> and <l1>'1'</l1> 在报告中被视为不同，虽然 assertEquals 认为这两个值是匹配的。
In this example the difference in the first index between <l0>1</l0> and <l1>'1'</l1> is reported even though assertEquals considers the values as a match.
在这个例子中，第一个索引项中的 <l0>1</l0> and <l1>'1'</l1> 在报告中被视为不同，虽然 assertEquals 认为这两个值是匹配的。
In this section, we will look at the example of a class that calculates the score for a game of bowling. The rules for this are as follows:
在本节中，我们来看一个例子，关于一个计算一局保龄球得分的类。规则如下：

In this section, we will look at the example of a class that represents a bank account. The contract for the <l0>BankAccount</l0> class not only requires methods to get and set the bank account's balance, as well as methods to deposit and withdraw money. It also specifies the following two conditions that must be ensured:

It cannot be emphasized enough that sharing fixtures between tests reduces the value of the tests. The underlying design problem is that objects are not loosely coupled. You will achieve better results solving the underlying design problem and then writing tests using stubs (see <x0/>), than by creating dependencies between tests at runtime and ignoring the opportunity to improve your design.
需要反复强调的是：在测试之间共享基境会降低测试的价值。潜在的设计问题是对象之间并非松散耦合。如果解决掉潜在的设计问题并使用桩件(stub)（参见<x0/>）来编写测试，就能达成更好的结果，而不是在测试之间产生运行时依赖并错过改进设计的机会。

It processes all classes that are declared at the time a test starts, not only the test class itself. It only applies to static class properties, not static variables within functions.
它所处理的并不只是测试类自身，而是在测试开始时已声明的所有类。它只作用于静态类属性，不作用于函数内声明的静态变量。

It's about figuring out what you are trying to do before you run off half-cocked to try to do it. You write a specification that nails down a small aspect of behaviour in a concise, unambiguous, and executable form. It's that simple. Does that mean you write tests? No. It means you write specifications of what your code will have to do. It means you specify the behaviour of your code ahead of time. But not far ahead of time. In fact, just before you write the code is best because that's when you have as much information at hand as you will up to that point. Like well done TDD, you work in tiny increments... specifying one small aspect of behaviour at a time, then implementing it.
这是关于在轻率地开始尝试之前先搞明白你到底要做什么的。你要编写以简洁、明确、可执行的形式编写一份规范，来明确行为的一个小方面。就是这么简单。这是否意味着编写测试呢？不。这意味着就代码需要做什么编写规范。这意味着提前指定代码的行为。不过并不提前很多。实际上，恰好在编写代码之前是最好的，因为在这个时刻你拥有最多的信息。就像 TDD 中那样，以很小的增量工作……一次只指定行为的一个小方面，然后实现之。

Many beginner and intermediate unit testing examples in any programming language suggest that it is perfectly easy to test your application's logic with simple tests. For database-centric applications this is far away from the reality. Start using Wordpress, TYPO3 or Symfony with Doctrine or Propel, for example, and you will easily experience considerable problems with PHPUnit: just because the database is so tightly coupled to these libraries.
在各种编程语言中，许多入门与中级的单元测试范例都暗示着这样一种信息：很容易用简单的测试来对应用程序的逻辑进行测试。但是对于以数据库为中心的应用程序而言，这与现实相去甚远。一旦开始使用诸如 Wordpress、TYPO3、或 Symfony（配合 Doctrine 或 Propel）之类的东西，就很容易在用 PHPUnit 时碰到超多问题：正是由于这些库和数据库之间实在耦合的太紧密了。

Now, we would like to move from tests that require manual interpretation to tests that can run automatically. In <x0/>, we write the comparison of the expected and actual values into the test code and print <l1>ok</l1> if the values are equal. If we ever see a <l2>not ok</l2> message, we know something is wrong.
现在，我们要把需要人工对结果进行解读的测试修改成能自动运行。在<x0/>中，我们在测试代码中加入了对预期值与实际值的比较，并且在两个值相等时输出 <l1>ok</l1>。一旦看到 <l2>not ok</l2> 讯息，我们就知道出错了。

Objects of some classes (e.g., <l0>PDO</l0>) cannot be serialized and the backup operation will break when such an object is stored e.g. in the <l1>$GLOBALS</l1> array.
某些类的实例对象（比如 <l0>PDO</l0>）无法序列化，因此如果把这样一个对象存放在比如说 <l1>$GLOBALS</l1> 数组内时，备份操作就会出问题。

Objects of some classes that are provided by PHP itself, such as <l0>PDO</l0> for example, cannot be serialized and the backup operation will break when such an object is stored in the <l1>$GLOBALS</l1> array, for instance.
某些 PHP 自身提供的类，比如 <l0>PDO</l0> ，其实例对象无法序列化，因此如果把这样一个对象存放在比如说 <l1>$GLOBALS</l1> 数组内时，备份操作就会出问题。

Of note, when using <l0>assertEquals()</l0> and <l1>assertNotEquals()</l1> where one variable is the number zero (either integer or float) and the other variable is a string, the types of the variables are also compared (i.e. <u2>=== comparison operator</u2>, not the normal <l3>==</l3> comparison operator). This can be problematic in the one case where it is assumed that <l4>0 == ""</l4> is true (due to <u5>type-juggling</u5>), but is in fact false when using <l6>assertEquals()</l6> or <l7>assertNotEquals()</l7>.

值得注意的是，应用 <l0>assertEquals()</l0> 和 <l1>assertNotEquals()</l1> 时，如果其中一个变量是数值零（无论整数还是浮点数），另一个变量是字符串，那么会同时比较变量的类型（换言之，会用 <u2>=== 比较操作符</u2>，而不是普通的 <l3>==</l3> 比较操作符）。在假定 <l4>0 == ""</l4> 为 true（根据 <u5>自动类型转换</u5>）的情况下使用 <l6>assertEquals()</l6> 或 <l7>assertNotEquals()</l7> 这可能会导致问题，因为事实上其判定结果为 false。
Once you get used to writing automated tests, you will likely discover more uses for tests. Here are some examples.
一旦习惯了编写自动测试，就可能会发现测试的更多用途。这有一些例子。

One of the goals of PHPUnit (see <x0/>) is that tests should be composable: we want to be able to run any number or combination of tests together, for instance all tests for the whole project, or the tests for all classes of a component that is part of the project, or just the tests for a single class.
PHPUnit 的目标之一（参见 <x0/>）是测试应当可组合：我们希望能将任意数量的测试以任意组合方式运行，例如，整个项目的所有测试，或者项目中的某个组件内的所有类的测试，又或者仅仅某单个类的测试。

One of the goals of PHPUnit is that tests should be composable: we want to be able to run any number or combination of tests together, for instance all tests for the whole project, or the tests for all classes of a component that is part of the project, or just the tests for a single class.
PHPUnit 的目标之一是测试应当可组合：我们希望能将任意数量的测试以任意组合方式运行，例如，整个项目的所有测试，或者项目中的某个组件内的所有类的测试，又或者仅仅某单个类的测试。

One of the most time-consuming parts of writing tests is writing the code to set the world up in a known state and then return it to its original state when the test is complete. This known state is called the <e0>fixture</e0> of the test.
在编写测试时，最费时的部分之一是编写代码来将整个场景设置成某个已知的状态，并在测试结束后将其复原到初始状态。这个已知的状态称为测试的 <e0>基境(fixture)</e0>。

Only mock objects generated within the scope of a test will be verified automatically by PHPUnit. Mock objects generated in data providers, for instance, or injected into the test using the <l0>@depends</l0> annotation will not be verified automatically by PHPUnit.
PHPUnit只会对在某个测试的作用域内生成的仿件对象进行自动校验。诸如在数据供给器内生成或用<l0>@depends</l0> 标注注入测试的仿件对象，PHPUnit并不会自动对其进行校验。
Only mock objects generated within the scope of a test will be verified automatically by PHPUnit. Mock objects generated in data providers, for instance, will not be verified by PHPUnit.
PHPUnit只会对在某个测试的作用域内生成的仿件对象进行自动校验，PHPUnit 不会对在诸如数据供给器内生成的仿件对象进行校验。
Only runs tests from the specified group(s). A test can be tagged as belonging to a group using the <l0>@group</l0> annotation.
只运行来自指定分组（可以多个）的测试。可以用 <l0>@group</l0> 标注为测试标记其所属的分组。
Only runs tests whose name matches the given regular expression pattern. If the pattern is not enclosed in delimiters, PHPUnit will enclose the pattern in <l0>/</l0> delimiters.
只运行名称与给定模式匹配的测试。如果模式未闭合包裹于分隔符，PHPUnit 将用 <l0>/</l0> 分隔符对其进行闭合包裹。
Only runs the test suite whose name matches the given pattern.
只运行名称与给定模式匹配的测试套件。
Only search for test files with specified suffix(es).
只查找文件名以指定后缀（可以多个）结尾的测试文件。

Opcode 覆盖率(Opcode Coverage)
Open a command line (e.g., press <k0><k1>Windows</k1><k2>R</k2></k0> » type <u3>cmd</u3> » <k4>ENTER</k4>)
打开命令行（例如，按 <k0><k1>Windows</k1><k2>R</k2></k0> » 输入 <u3>cmd</u3> » <k4>ENTER</k4>)
Open a new command line and confirm that you can execute PHPUnit from any path:
新开一个命令行窗口，确认一下可以在任意路径下执行 PHPUnit：
Optional packages
可选的组件包
Optionally print to <l0>STDERR</l0> instead of <l1>STDOUT</l1>.
选择输出到 <l0>STDERR</l0> 而非 <l1>STDOUT</l1>.

Optionally, all whitelisted files can be added to the code coverage report by setting <l0>addUncoveredFilesFromWhitelist="true"</l0> in your PHPUnit configuration (see <x1/>). This allows the inclusion of files that are not tested yet at all. If you want to get information about which lines of such an uncovered file are executable, for instance, you also need to set <l2>processUncoveredFilesFromWhitelist="true"</l2> in your PHPUnit configuration (see <x3/>).

可以在 PHPUnit 的配置信息中设置 <l0>addUncoveredFilesFromWhitelist="true"</l0> 来将白名单中包含的所有文件全部加入到代码覆盖率报告中（参见<x1/>）。这样可以把完全没有测试到的文件也一并包含到报告中。如果需要知道这些未被覆盖文件中有哪些行是可执行的，需要同时在 PHPUnit 的配置信息中设置 <l2>processUncoveredFilesFromWhitelist="true"</l2>（参见<x3/>）。

测试的其他用途
Output During Test Execution
测试执行期间产生的输出
Output debug information such as the name of a test when its execution starts.
输出调试信息，例如当一个测试开始执行时输出其名称。
Output more verbose information, for instance the names of tests that were incomplete or have been skipped.
输出更详尽的信息，例如不完整或者跳过的测试的名称。
Overall, integrated unit testing makes the cost and risk of any individual change smaller. It will allow the project to make [...] major architectural improvements [...] quickly and confidently.
总之，进行集成单元测试降低了任何修改的成本与风险。这使得项目能够更快并且更有信心地进行[...]重大架构改良[...]。
Override to perform assertions that are shared by all tests of a test case. This method is called after each command that is sent to the Selenium Server server.
覆盖本方法来为所有测试用例中的测试执行公用断言。每次向 Selenium Server 服务器发送命令之后都会调用本方法。

PHPUnit 手册

PHPUnit also requires the <u0>pcre</u0>, <u1>reflection</u1>, and <u2>spl</u2> extensions. These standard extensions are enabled by default and cannot be disabled without patching PHP's build system and/or C sources.
PHPUnit 还需要 <u0>pcre</u0>、<u1>reflection</u1>、<u2>spl</u2> 扩展。这些标准扩展默认启用，并且除非修改 PHP 的构建系统和 C 源代码，否则无法禁用它们。
PHPUnit also requires the <u0>pcre</u0>, <u1>reflection</u1>, and <u2>spl</u2> extensions. They are required by PHP core since 5.3.0 and normally cannot be disabled.
PHPUnit 还需要 <u0>pcre</u0>、<u1>reflection</u1>、<u2>spl</u2> 扩展。自 5.3.0 开始 PHP 核心需要这些扩展，通常无法禁用。
PHPUnit and Selenium
PHPUnit 与 Selenium

PHPUnit assumes that most tests succeed and it is not worth reporting the details of successful tests. When a test fails, that fact is worth noting and reporting. The vast majority of tests should succeed and are not worth commenting on except to count the number of tests that run. This is an assumption that is really built into the reporting classes, and not into the core of PHPUnit. When the results of a test run are reported, you see how many tests were executed, but you only see details for those that failed.
PHPUnit 假定绝大多数测试都会成功，并且这些成功的测试其细节无需报告。只有失败的测试才值得关注并报告。除了统计运行的测试数量外，对占绝大多数的成功的测试无需关注。这个假设实际上是内建于报告类中，而非 PHPUnit 的内核中。在测试报告中，你可以看到一共运行了多少测试，但是只有失败的测试才有明细信息。

PHPUnit assumes that the database schema with all its tables, triggers, sequences and views is created before a test is run. This means you as developer have to make sure that the database is correctly setup before running the suite.
PHPUnit 假设在测试运行之前数据库以及其中的所有表(table)、触发器(trigger)、序列(Sequence)和视图(view)都已经创建好。这意味着开发者必须在运行测试套件之前确保数据库已经正确建立。

PHPUnit attempts to resolve these conflicts by using PHP as the testing language. Sometimes the full power of PHP is overkill for writing little straight-line tests, but by using PHP we leverage all the experience and tools programmers already have in place. Since we are trying to convince reluctant testers, lowering the barrier to writing those initial tests is particularly important.
PHPUnit 使用 PHP 本身来作为测试语言，尝试以此解决这些矛盾。在某些情况下，用功能强大的 PHP 的来写个小小的测试显得有些杀鸡用牛刀。但是使用 PHP，让程序员们可以直接利用已经掌握的全部经验和工具。由于我们要说服心存抵触的测试人员，因此降低开始编写测试的门槛是很重要的。
PHPUnit can be extended in various ways to make the writing of tests easier and customize the feedback you get from running tests. Here are common starting points to extend PHPUnit.
可以用多种方式对 PHPUnit 进行扩展，使编写测试更容易，以及对运行测试所得到的反馈进行定制。扩展 PHPUnit 时，一般从这些点入手：

PHPUnit can be strict about output during tests. This check can be enabled by using the <l0>--disallow-test-output</l0> option on the commandline or by setting <l1>beStrictAboutOutputDuringTests="true"</l1> in PHPUnit's XML configuration file.
PHPUnit 可以更严格对待测试执行期间产生的输出。 此项检查可以用命令行选项 <l0>--disallow-test-output</l0> 或在 PHPUnit 的 XML 配置文件中设置 <l1>beStrictAboutOutputDuringTests="true"</l1> 来启用。

PHPUnit can be strict about tests that do not test anything. This check can be enabled by using the <l0>--report-useless-tests</l0> option on the commandline or by setting <l1>beStrictAboutTestsThatDoNotTestAnything="true"</l1> in PHPUnit's XML configuration file.
PHPUnit 可以更严格对待事实上不测试任何内容的测试。此项检查可以用命令行选项 <l0>--report-useless-tests</l0> 或在 PHPUnit 的 XML 配置文件中设置 <l1>beStrictAboutTestsThatDoNotTestAnything="true"</l1> 来启用。

PHPUnit can be strict about tests that manipulate global state. This check can be enabled by using the <l0>--strict-global-state</l0> option on the commandline or by setting <l1>beStrictAboutChangesToGlobalState="true"</l1> in PHPUnit's XML configuration file.
PHPUnit 可以更严格对待篡改全局状态的测试。此项检查可以用命令行选项 <l0>--strict-global-state</l0> 或在 PHPUnit 的 XML 配置文件中设置 <l1>beStrictAboutChangesToGlobalState="true"</l1> 来启用。

PHPUnit can be strict about unintentionally covered code. This check can be enabled by using the <l0>--strict-coverage</l0> option on the commandline or by setting <l1>checkForUnintentionallyCoveredCode="true"</l1> in PHPUnit's XML configuration file.
PHPUnit 可以更严格对待意外的代码覆盖。此项检查可以用命令行选项 <l0>--strict-coverage</l0> 或在 PHPUnit 的 XML 配置文件中设置 <l1>checkForUnintentionallyCoveredCode="true"</l1> 来启用。

PHPUnit can generate an HTML-based code coverage report as well as XML-based logfiles with code coverage information in various formats (Clover, Crap4J, PHPUnit). Code coverage information can also be reported as text (and printed to STDOUT) and exported as PHP code for further processing.
PHPUnit 可以生成基于 HTML 的代码覆盖率报告，同时也能生成好几种（Clover、Crap4J、PHPUnit）基于XML的代码覆盖率信息记录文件。代码覆盖率信息也能以文本格式提供（同时可以输出到STDOUT）或以PHP代码格式输出以供进一步处理。

PHPUnit can optionally capture a screenshot when a Selenium test fails. To enable this, set <l0>$captureScreenshotOnFailure</l0>, <l1>$screenshotPath</l1>, and <l2>$screenshotUrl</l2> in your test case class as shown in <x3/>.
PHPUnit 还可以在 Selenium 测试失败时截屏。要启用这个功能，在测试用例类里设置 <l0>$captureScreenshotOnFailure</l0>、<l1>$screenshotPath</l1> 和 <l2>$screenshotUrl</l2>，如<x3/>中所示。

PHPUnit can perform additional checks while it executes the tests. In addition to the fine-grained control over the various strict mode checks (see below) you may use the <l0>--strict</l0> commandline option or set <l1>strict="true"</l1> in PHPUnit's XML configuration file to enable all of them.
在执行测试时，PHPUnit 可以进行一些额外的检查。除了细粒度地控制各种严格模式下的检查（见下文）外，还可以使用命令行选项 <l0>--strict</l0> 或在 PHPUnit 的 XML 配置文件中设置 <l1>strict="true"</l1> 来将它们全部启用。
PHPUnit can perform the additional checks documented below while it executes the tests.
在执行测试时，PHPUnit 可以进行一些额外的检查，见下文。
PHPUnit can produce several types of logfiles.
PHPUnit 可以生成几种类型的日志文件。

PHPUnit distinguishes between <e0>failures</e0> and <e1>errors</e1>. A failure is a violated PHPUnit assertion such as a failing <l2>assertEquals()</l2> call. An error is an unexpected exception or a PHP error. Sometimes this distinction proves useful since errors tend to be easier to fix than failures. If you have a big list of problems, it is best to tackle the errors first and see if you have any failures left when they are all fixed.

PHPUnit 区分 <e0>败(failure)</e0>与<e1>错误(error)</e1>。失败指的是被违背了的 PHPUnit 断言，例如一个失败的 <l2>assertEquals()</l2> 调用。错误指的是意料之外的异常(exception)或 PHP 错误。这种差异已被证明在某些时候是非常有用的，因为错误往往比失败更容易修复。如果得到了一个非常长的问题列表，那么最好先对付错误，当错误全部修复了之后再试一次瞧瞧还有没有失败。

PHPUnit errs on the side of isolation over quick execution. Isolated tests are valuable because they provide high-quality feedback. You do not get a report with a bunch of test failures, which were really caused because one test at the beginning of the suite failed and left the world messed up for the rest of the tests. This orientation towards isolated tests encourages designs with a large number of simple objects. Each object can be tested quickly in isolation. The result is better designs <e0>and</e0> faster tests.
PHPUnit 侧重于相互隔离而非执行快速。相互隔离的测试能提供高质量的反馈，这是很宝贵的。不会碰到这样的情况：其实仅仅只有测试套件开头的某个测试失败，但因为它给后继测试留下了混乱的测试场景，结果导致在测试报告里出现了一连串的测试失败信息。对相互隔离的侧重鼓励在设计中采用大量简单对象。每个对象都能在互相隔离的情况下快速完成测试。由此得到的结果是更好的设计<e0>和</e0>更快的测试。

PHPUnit has built-in support for using Prophecy to create test doubles since version 4.5. <x0/> shows how the same test shown in <x1/> can be expressed using Prophecy's philosophy of prophecies and revelations:
从版本 4.5 开始，PHPUnit 为用 Prophecy 建立测试替身提供了内建支持。<x0/>展示了<x1/>中展示的测试应该如何用 Prophecy 的的预言式理念方式来达到同样的效果：

PHPUnit requires the <u0>ctype</u0>, <u1>dom</u1>, <u2>json</u2>, <u3>pcre</u3>, <u4>reflection</u4>, and <u5>spl</u5> extensions. These extensions are usually compiled and enabled by default. Some of them cannot even be disabled and are therefore always available.
PHPUnit 需要使用以下扩展：<u0>ctype</u0>、<u1>dom</u1>、<u2>json</u2>、<u3>pcre</u3>、<u4>reflection</u4> 和 <u5>spl</u5>。通常，这些扩展会被一并编译并默认启用。其中的某些甚至是根本无法禁用的。
PHPUnit requires the <u0>dom</u0> and <u1>json</u1> extensions, which are normally enabled by default.
PHPUnit 需要使用 <u0>dom</u0> 和 <u1>json</u1> 扩展，它们通常是默认启用的。

PHPUnit requires the <u0>dom</u0>, <u1>json</u1>, <u2>pcre</u2>, <u3>reflection</u3>, and <u4>spl</u4> extensions. These extensions are usually compiled and enabled by default. Some of them cannot even be disabled and are therefore always available.
PHPUnit 需要使用以下扩展：<u0>dom</u0>、<u1>json</u1>、<u2>pcre</u2>、<u3>reflection</u3> 及 <u4>spl</u4>。通常，这些扩展会被一并编译并默认启用。其中的某些甚至是根本无法禁用的。
PHPUnit ships with one concrete test decorator: <l0>PHPUnit_Extensions_RepeatedTest</l0>. It is used to run a test repeatedly and only count it as a success if all iterations are successful.
PHPUnit 了包含了一个具体的测试修饰器：<l0>PHPUnit_Extensions_RepeatedTest</l0>。它用于重复运行某个测试，并且只在全部循环中都成功时计为成功。

PHPUnit ships with two concrete test decorators: <l0>PHPUnit_Extensions_RepeatedTest</l0> and <l1>PHPUnit_Extensions_TestSetup</l1>. The former is used to run a test repeatedly and only count it as a success if all iterations are successful. The latter was discussed in <x2/>.
PHPUnit 包含了两个具体的测试修饰器： <l0>PHPUnit_Extensions_RepeatedTest</l0> 和 <l1>PHPUnit_Extensions_TestSetup</l1>。前者用于重复运行某个测试，并且只在全部次数都成功时计为成功。后者则在<x2/>中讨论。
PHPUnit supports different ways of organizing tests and composing them into a test suite. This chapter shows the most commonly used approaches.
PHPUnit 支持好几种不同的方式来组织测试以及将它们编排组合成测试套件。本章介绍了最常用的方法。

PHPUnit supports sharing the setup code. Before a test method is run, a template method called <l0>setUp()</l0> is invoked. <l1>setUp()</l1> is where you create the objects against which you will test. Once the test method has finished running, whether it succeeded or failed, another template method called <l2>tearDown()</l2> is invoked. <l3>tearDown()</l3> is where you clean up the objects against which you tested.
PHPUnit 支持共享建立基境的代码。在运行某个测试方法前，会调用一个名叫 <l0>setUp()</l0> 的模板方法。<l1>setUp()</l1> 是创建测试所用对象的地方。当测试方法运行结束后，不管是成功还是失败，都会调用另外一个名叫 <l2>tearDown()</l2> 的模板方法。<l3>tearDown()</l3> 是清理测试所用对象的地方。

PHPUnit supports the declaration of explicit dependencies between test methods. Such dependencies do not define the order in which the test methods are to be executed but they allow the returning of an instance of the test fixture by a producer and passing it to the dependent consumers.
PHPUnit支持对测试方法之间的显式依赖关系进行声明。这种依赖关系并不是定义在测试方法的执行顺序中，而是允许生产者(producer)返回一个测试基境(fixture)的实例，并将此实例传递给依赖于它的消费者(consumer)们。

PHPUnit supports the declaration of explicit dependencies between test methods. Such dependencies do not define the order in which the test methods are to be executed but they allow the returning of an instance of the test fixture by a producer and passing it to the dependent consumers. <x0/> shows how to use the <l1>@depends</l1> annotation to express dependencies between test methods.
PHPUnit支持对测试方法之间的显式依赖关系进行声明。这种依赖关系并不是定义在测试方法的执行顺序中，而是允许生产者(producer)返回一个测试基境(fixture)的实例，并将此实例传递给依赖于它的消费者(consumer)们。<x0/>展示了如何用 <l1>@depends</l1> 标注来表达测试方法之间的依赖关系。
PHPUnit will then iterate over all the fixture rows specified and insert them into their respective tables.
PHPUnit 随后将迭代所有指定的基境数据行并将其插入到对应的表里。
PHPUnit's Goals
PHPUnit 的目标

PHPUnit's TestDox functionality looks at a test class and all the test method names and converts them from camel case PHP names to sentences: <l0>testBalanceIsInitiallyZero()</l0> becomes "Balance is initially zero". If there are several test methods whose names only differ in a suffix of one or more digits, such as <l1>testBalanceCannotBecomeNegative()</l1> and <l2>testBalanceCannotBecomeNegative2()</l2>, the sentence "Balance cannot become negative" will appear only once, assuming that all of these tests succeed.

PHPUnit 的 TestDox 功能着眼于测试类及其所有测试方法的名称，将它们驼峰式大小写（camel case）拼写的 PHP 名称转换为句子：<l0>testBalanceIsInitiallyZero()</l0> 转化为 "Balance is initially zero（初始结余为零）"。如果有多个测试方法的名字互相之间的差异只是一个或多个数字的后缀，例如 <l1>testBalanceCannotBecomeNegative()</l1> 和 <l2>testBalanceCannotBecomeNegative2()</l2>，假如所有这些测试都成功，句子"Balance cannot become negative（结余不能变为负数）"只会出现一次。

PHPUnit's XML configuration file (<x0/>) can also be used to compose a test suite. <x1/> shows a minimal <f2>phpunit.xml</f2> file that will add all <l3>*Test</l3> classes that are found in <f4>*Test.php</f4> files when the <f5>tests</f5> directory is recursively traversed.
PHPUnit的 XML 配置文件（<x0/>）也可以用于编排测试套件。<x1/>展示了一个最小化的 <f2>phpunit.xml</f2> 例子，它将在递归遍历 <f5>tests</f5> 时添加所有在 <f4>*Test.php</f4> 文件中找到的 <l3>*Test</l3> 类。

PHPUnit's XML configuration file (<x0/>) can also be used to compose a test suite. <x1/> shows a minimal example that will add all <l2>*Test</l2> classes that are found in <f3>*Test.php</f3> files when the <f4>tests</f4> directory is recursively traversed.
PHPUnit的 XML 配置文件（<x0/>）也可以用于编排测试套件。<x1/>展示了一个最小化的例子，它将在递归遍历 <f4>tests</f4> 时添加所有在 <f3>*Test.php</f3> 文件中找到的 <l2>*Test</l2> 类。

PHPUnit's XML configuration file (see <x0/>) can be used to control the blacklist and the whitelist. Using a whitelist is the recommended best practice to control the list of files included in the code coverage report.
PHPUnit 的 XML 配置文件（参见 <x0/>）可以用于控制黑名单与白名单。使用白名单来控制代码覆盖率报告所包含的文件是推荐的最佳实践。

PHPUnit's code coverage functionality makes use of the <u0>PHP_CodeCoverage</u0> component, which in turn leverages the statement coverage functionality provided by the <u1>Xdebug</u1> extension for PHP.
PHPUnit 的代码覆盖率功能使用了 <u0>PHP_CodeCoverage</u0> 组件，这反过来又利用了 <u1>Xdebug</u1> 扩展为 PHP 提供的语句覆盖率功能。

Please note that <l0>final</l0>, <l1>private</l1> and <l2>static</l2> methods cannot be stubbed or mocked. They are ignored by PHPUnit's test double functionality and retain their original behavior.
请注意，<l0>final</l0>、<l1>private</l1> 和 <l2>static</l2> 方法无法对其进行上桩(stub)或模仿(mock)。PHPUnit 的测试替身功能将会忽略它们，并维持它们的原始行为。
Please note that as of 4.8, options can be put after the argument(s).
请注意，从 4.8 开始，选项不能放在参数之后。
Please note that options must not be put after the argument(s).
请注意，选项不能放在参数之后。
Please note that setting the <l0>$backupGlobalsBlacklist</l0> attribute inside the <l1>setUp()</l1> method, for instance, has no effect.
请注意，在方法内（例如在 <l1>setUp()</l1> 内）对<l0>$backupGlobalsBlacklist</l0> 属性进行设置是无效的。
Please note that setting the <l0>$backupStaticAttributesBlacklist</l0> attribute inside the <l1>setUp()</l1> method, for instance, has no effect.
在方法（例如 <l1>setUp()</l1> ）内对 <l0>$backupStaticAttributesBlacklist</l0> 属性进行设置是无效的。

Please note that starting with PHPUnit 4.0.0 the PEAR package of PHPUnit is merely a distribution mechanism for the PHP Archive (PHAR) and that many of PHPUnit's dependencies will no longer be released individually via PEAR. We will eventually stop making releases of PHPUnit available via PEAR altogether.
请注意，从 PHPUnit 4.0.0 开始，PHPUnit 的 PEAR 包只作为分发 PHP 档案包(PHAR)的一种机制，PHPUnit 的许多依赖项不再单独通过 PEAR 发布。最终，我们将完全停止在 PEAR 发布 PHPUnit。

Please note that the loading of sourcecode files that is performed when <l0>processUncoveredFilesFromWhitelist="true"</l0> is set can cause problems when a sourcecode file contains code outside the scope of a class or function, for instance.
请注意，当设置了 <l0>processUncoveredFilesFromWhitelist="true"</l0> 时将对源代码文件进行载入，这在某些情况下可能导致问题，比如，源代码文件包含有处于类或者函数作用域之外的代码。
Please note that this functionality is only available when the tokenizer and Xdebug extensions are installed.
请注意，此功能仅当安装了 tokenizer 和 Xdebug 这两个 PHP 扩展后才可用。

Please note that using the PEAR installer to update from PHPUnit 3.7 to PHPUnit 4.0 will leave stale source files from previous versions of PHPUnit's dependencies (PHP_CodeCoverage, PHPUnit_MockObject, ...) behind in your PHP environment's PEAR directory. It is advised to uninstall the respective PEAR packages.
请注意，如果用 PEAR 安装器来从 PHPUnit 3.7 升级到 PHPUnit 4.0，将导致在 PHP 环境变量所指定的 PEAR 目录中遗留一些 PHPUnit 依赖项（PHP_CodeCoverage、 PHPUnit_MockObject、……）老版本的陈旧源文件。建议卸载对应的 PEAR 包。

Please pay attention to the fact that the parameters managing has been changed. The previous implementation clones all object parameters. It did not allow to check whether the same object was passed to method or not. <x0/> shows where the new implementation could be useful. <x1/> shows how to switch back to previous behavior.
请关注一下这个事实：参数管理方式已经修改过了。在之前的实现中，将会克隆对象的所有参数。这样就无法检查传递给方法的是否是同一个对象。<x0/> 展示了新的实现方式在什么情况下会非常有用。<x1/>展示了如何切换回之前的行为方式。
Please read "<u0>What Every Computer Scientist Should Know About Floating-Point Arithmetic</u0>" to understand why <l1>$delta</l1> is neccessary.
关于为什么 <l1>$delta</l1> 参数是必须的，请阅读《<u0>关于浮点运算，每一位计算机科学从业人员都应该知道的事实</u0>》。
Please read <x0/> in case you are upgrading from a previous version of PHPUnit.
如果从旧版本 PHPUnit 升级，请阅读<x0/>。
Please refer to <x0/> for a list of commandline switches that control code coverage functionality as well as <x1/> for the relevant configuration settings.
<x0/>中列出了各种控制代码覆盖率功能的命令行参数供参考，同时<x1/>中可以找到其他相关的配置信息。
Please refer to the <u0>documentation of Selenium commands</u0> for a reference of the commands available and how they are used.
请查看 <u0>Selenium 命令文档</u0>来获得所有可用的命令的参考以及它们的使用方法。
Please refer to the <u0>documentation</u0> for Prophecy for further details on how to create, configure, and use stubs, spies, and mocks using this alternative test double framework.
更多关于如何用这个测试替身框架来创建、配置及使用桩件、谍件、仿件的细节，请参考 Prophecy 的 <u0>文档</u0>。
Possible @requires usages
可能的 @requires 用法
Possible Values
可能的值
Prentice Hall
Prentice Hall
Prepend PHP's <l0>include_path</l0> with given path(s).
向 PHP 的 <l0>include_path</l0> 开头添加指定路径（可以多个）。

Previously all object parameters where cloned when mocking. This lead to issues when testing trying to check whether the same object was passed to method or not and other problem with uncloneable objects. As a long standing feature request by many this behavior was changed. <x0/> shows where the new implementation could be useful. <x1/> shows how to switch back to previous behavior.
之前，在模仿(mock)一个对象时会克隆(clone)起所有参数。这导致在测试中尝试判定传递给方法的是否是同一个参数是碰到问题，另外在碰到不可克隆的对象时还会有其他问题。作为一直以来都被许多人所要求的特性，这个行为已经改变了。<x0/>展示了新实现方式的有益之处。<x1/>展示了如何切换回之前的行为方式。
Printed when an assertion fails while running the test method.
当测试方法运行过程中一个断言失败时输出。
Printed when an error occurs while running the test method.
当测试方法运行过程中产生一个错误时输出。
Printed when the test has been marked as risky (see <x0/>).
当测试被标记为有风险时输出（参见<x0/>）。
Printed when the test has been skipped (see <x0/>).
当测试被跳过时输出（参见<x0/>）。
Printed when the test is marked as being incomplete or not yet implemented (see <x0/>).
当测试被标记为不完整或未实现时输出（参见<x0/>）。
Printed when the test succeeds.
当测试成功时输出。

Probably the easiest way to compose a test suite is to keep all test case source files in a test directory. PHPUnit can automatically discover and run the tests by recursively traversing the test directory.
编排测试套件的各种方式中，最简单的大概就是把所有测试用例源文件放在一个测试目录中。通过对测试目录进行递归遍历，PHPUnit 能自动发现并运行测试。

Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if <l1>$actual</l1> is not an instance of <l2>$expected</l2>.
当 <l1>$actual</l1> 不是 <l2>$expected</l2> 的实例时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if <l1>$actual</l1> is not empty.
当 <l1>$actual</l1> 非空时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if <l1>$actual</l1> is not matched by the <l2>$matcher</l2>.
当 <l1>$actual</l1> 与 <l2>$matcher</l2> 所指定的信息不匹配时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if <l1>$actual</l1> is not of the <l2>$expected</l2> type.
当 <l1>$actual</l1> 不是 <l2>$expected</l2> 所指明的类型时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if <l1>$array</l1> does not contains the <l2>$subset</l2>.
当 <l1>$array</l1> 不包含 <l2>$subset</l2> 时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if <l1>$array</l1> does not have the <l2>$key</l2>.
当 <l1>$array</l1> 不包含 <l2>$key</l2> 时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if <l1>$className::attributeName</l1> does not exist.
当 <l1>$className::attributeName</l1> 不存在时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if <l1>$condition</l1> is <l2>FALSE</l2>.
当 <l1>$condition</l1> 为 <l2>FALSE</l2> 时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if <l1>$condition</l1> is <l2>TRUE</l2>.
当 <l1>$condition</l1> 为 <l2>TRUE</l2> 时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if <l1>$haystack</l1> does not contain only instances of class <l2>$classname</l2>.
当 <l1>$haystack</l1> 并非仅包含类 <l2>$classname</l2> 的实例时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if <l1>$haystack</l1> does not contain only variables of type <l2>$type</l2>.
当 <l1>$haystack</l1> 并非仅包含类型为 <l2>$type</l2> 的变量时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if <l1>$needle</l1> is not a substring of <l2>$haystack</l2>.
当 <l1>$needle</l1> 不是 <l2>$haystack</l2> 的子字符串时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if <l1>$needle</l1> is not an element of <l2>$haystack</l2>.
当 <l1>$needle</l1> 不是 <l2>$haystack</l2>的元素时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if <l1>$object->attributeName</l1> does not exist.
当 <l1>$object->attributeName</l1> 不存在时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if <l1>$string</l1> does not match the regular expression <l2>$pattern</l2>.
当 <l1>$string</l1> 不匹配于正则表达式 <l2>$pattern</l2> 时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if <l1>$variable</l1> is not <l2>INF</l2>.
当 <l1>$actual</l1> 不是 <l2>INF</l2> 时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if <l1>$variable</l1> is not <l2>NAN</l2>.
当 <l1>$variable</l1> 不是 <l2>NAN</l2> 时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if <l1>$variable</l1> is not <l2>NULL</l2>.
当 <l1>$actual</l1> 不是 <l2>NULL</l2> 时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the <l1>$string</l1> does not end with <l2>$suffix</l2>.
当 <l1>$string</l1> 不以 <l2>$suffix</l2> 结尾时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the <l1>$string</l1> does not match the <l2>$format</l2> string.
当 <l1>$string</l1> 不匹配于 <l2>$format</l2> 定义的格式时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the <l1>$string</l1> does not match the contents of the <l2>$formatFile</l2>.
当 <l1>$string</l1> 不匹配于 <l2>$formatFile</l2> 的内容所定义的格式时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the <l1>$string</l1> does not start with <l2>$prefix</l2>.
当 <l1>$string</l1> 不以 <l2>$prefix</l2> 开头时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the <l1>$value</l1> does not match the <l2>$constraint</l2>.
当 <l1>$value</l1> 不符合约束条件 <l2>$constraint</l2> 时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。

Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the CSS selector <l1>$selector</l1> does not match <l2>$count</l2> elements in the DOMNode <l3>$actual</l3> with a value that matches <l4>$pattern</l4>.
将 CSS 选择器 <l1>$selector</l1> 应用于 DOMNode <l3>$actual</l3>，当匹配的元素中内容与正则表达式 <l4>$pattern</l4> 匹配的元素的数量与 <l2>$count</l2> 不符时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the CSS selector <l1>$selector</l1> does not match <l2>$count</l2> elements in the DOMNode <l3>$actual</l3> with the value <l4>$content</l4>.
将 CSS 选择器 <l1>$selector</l1> 应用于 DOMNode <l3>$actual</l3>，当匹配的元素中内容为 <l4>$content</l4> 的元素的数量与 <l2>$count</l2> 不符时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the CSS selector <l1>$selector</l1> does not match <l2>$count</l2> elements in the DOMNode <l3>$actual</l3>.
将 CSS 选择器 <l1>$selector</l1> 应用于 DOMNode <l3>$actual</l3>，当匹配元素的数量与 <l2>$count</l2> 不符时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the XML Structure of the DOMElement in <l1>$actualElement</l1> is not equal to the XML structure of the DOMElement in <l2>$expectedElement</l2>.
当 <l1>$actualElement</l1> 中 DOMElement 的 XML 结构与 <l2>$expectedElement</l2> 中 DOMElement的 XML 结构不相同时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the XML document in <l1>$actualFile</l1> is not equal to the XML document in <l2>$expectedFile</l2>.
当 <l1>$actualFile</l1> 对应的 XML 文档与 <l2>$expectedFile</l2> 对应的 XML 文档不相同时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the XML document in <l1>$actualXml</l1> is not equal to the XML document in <l2>$expectedFile</l2>.
当 <l1>$actualXml</l1> 对应的 XML 文档与 <l2>$expectedFile</l2> 对应的 XML 文档不相同时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the XML document in <l1>$actualXml</l1> is not equal to the XML document in <l2>$expectedXml</l2>.
当 <l1>$actualXml</l1> 对应的 XML 文档与 <l2>$expectedXml</l2> 对应的 XML 文档不相同时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the file specified by <l1>$expected</l1> does not have the same contents as the file specified by <l2>$actual</l2>.
当 <l1>$expected</l1> 所指定的文件与 <l2>$actual</l2> 所指定的文件内容不同时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the file specified by <l1>$expectedFile</l1> does not have <l2>$actualString</l2> as its contents.
当 <l1>$expectedFile</l1> 所指定的文件其内容不是 <l2>$actualString</l2> 时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the file specified by <l1>$filename</l1> does not exist.
当 <l1>$filename</l1> 所指定的文件不存在时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the number of elements in <l1>$haystack</l1> is not <l2>$expectedCount</l2>.
当 <l1>$haystack</l1> 中的元素数量不是 <l2>$expectedCount</l2> 时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the two arrays <l1>$expected</l1> and <l2>$actual</l2> are not equal.
当 <l1>$expected</l1> 和 <l2>$actual</l2> 这两个数组不相等时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the two floats <l1>$expected</l1> and <l2>$actual</l2> are not within <l3>$delta</l3> of each other.
当两个浮点数 <l1>$expected</l1> 和 <l2>$actual</l2> 之间的差值（的绝对值）大于 <l3>$delta</l3> 时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the two objects <l1>$expected</l1> and <l2>$actual</l2> do not have equal attribute values.
当 <l1>$expected</l1> 和 <l2>$actual</l2> 这两个对象的属性值不相等时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the two variables <l1>$expected</l1> and <l2>$actual</l2> are not equal.
当两个变量 <l1>$expected</l1> 和 <l2>$actual</l2> 不相等时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the two variables <l1>$expected</l1> and <l2>$actual</l2> do not have the same type and value.
当两个变量 <l1>$expected</l1> 和 <l2>$actual</l2> 的值与类型不完全相同时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the two variables <l1>$expected</l1> and <l2>$actual</l2> do not reference the same object.
当两个变量 <l1>$expected</l1> 和 <l2>$actual</l2> 不是指向同一个对象的引用时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。

Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the uncommented canonical form of the XML documents represented by the two DOMDocument objects <l1>$expected</l1> and <l2>$actual</l2> are not equal.
当 <l1>$expected</l1> 和 <l2>$actual</l2> 这两个 DOMDocument 对象所表示的 XML 文档对应的无注释规范形式不相同时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the value of <l1>$actual</l1> is not greater than or equal to the value of <l2>$expected</l2>.
当 <l1>$actual</l1> 的值不大于且不等于 <l2>$expected</l2> 的值时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the value of <l1>$actual</l1> is not greater than the value of <l2>$expected</l2>.
当 <l1>$actual</l1> 的值不大于 <l2>$expected</l2> 的值时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the value of <l1>$actual</l1> is not less than or equal to the value of <l2>$expected</l2>.
当 <l1>$actual</l1> 的值不小于且不等于 <l2>$expected</l2> 的值时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the value of <l1>$actual</l1> is not less than the value of <l2>$expected</l2>.
当 <l1>$actual</l1> 的值不小于 <l2>$expected</l2> 的值时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the value of <l1>$actualFile</l1> does not match the value of <l2>$expectedFile</l2>.
当 <l1>$actualFile</l1> 对应的值与 <l2>$expectedFile</l2> 对应的值不匹配时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the value of <l1>$actualJson</l1> does not match the value of <l2>$expectedFile</l2>.
当 <l1>$actualJson</l1> 对应的值与 <l2>$expectedFile</l2> 对应的值不匹配时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error identified by <l0>$message</l0> if the value of <l1>$actualJson</l1> does not match the value of <l2>$expectedJson</l2>.
当 <l1>$actualJson</l1> 对应的值与 <l2>$expectedJson</l2> 对应的值不匹配时报告错误，错误讯息由 <l0>$message</l0> 指定。
Reports an error if the element identified by <l0>$locator</l0> contains the given <l1>$text</l1>.
当由 <l0>$locator</l0> 所标识的元素包含给定的 <l1>$text</l1>时报告错误。
Reports an error if the element identified by <l0>$locator</l0> does not contain the given <l1>$text</l1>.
当由 <l0>$locator</l0> 所标识的元素不包含给定的 <l1>$text</l1>时报告错误。
Reports an error if the given label is not selected.
当给定的标签未被选定时报告错误。
Reports an error if the given label is selected.
当给定的标签被选定时报告错误。
Reports an error if the given option is available.
当给定的选项可用时报告错误。
Reports an error if the given option is not available.
当给定的选项不可用时报告错误。
Reports an error if the given value is not selected.
当给定的值未被选定时报告错误。
Reports an error if the given value is selected.
当给定的值被选定时报告一个错误。
Reports an error if the value of the element identified by <l0>$locator</l0> contains the given <l1>$text</l1>.
当由 <l0>$locator</l0> 所标识的元素的值包含给定的 <l1>$text</l1>时报告错误。
Reports an error if the value of the element identified by <l0>$locator</l0> does not contain the given <l1>$text</l1>.
当由 <l0>$locator</l0> 所标识的元素的值不包含给定的 <l1>$text</l1>时报告错误。
Reports an error if the value of the element identified by <l0>$locator</l0> is equal to the given <l1>$text</l1>.
当由 <l0>$locator</l0> 所标识的元素的值与给定的 <l1>$text</l1>相等时报告错误。
Reports an error if the value of the element identified by <l0>$locator</l0> is not equal to the given <l1>$text</l1>.
当由 <l0>$locator</l0> 所标识的元素的值与给定的 <l1>$text</l1>不等时报告错误。
Reports the test progress as agile documentation. See <x0/> for more details.
将测试进度以敏捷文档方式报告。更多细节请参见 <x0/>。
Reports the test progress using the <u0>Test Anything Protocol (TAP)</u0>. See <x1/> for more details.

Requirements
需求
Return the name of the expected exception.
返回预期异常的名称。
Returns a matcher that matches when the method it is evaluated for is executed at least once.
返回一个匹配器，当被评定的方法执行至少一次时匹配成功。
Returns a matcher that matches when the method it is evaluated for is executed exactly <l0>$count</l0> times.
返回一个匹配器，当被评定的方法执行恰好 <l0>$count</l0> 次时匹配成功。
Returns a matcher that matches when the method it is evaluated for is executed exactly once.
返回一个匹配器，当被评定的方法执行恰好一次时匹配成功。
Returns a matcher that matches when the method it is evaluated for is executed zero or more times.
返回一个匹配器，当被评定的方法执行0次或更多次（即任意次数）时匹配成功。
Returns a matcher that matches when the method it is evaluated for is invoked at the given <l0>$index</l0>.
返回一个匹配器，当被评定的方法是第 <l0>$index</l0> 个执行的方法时匹配成功。
Returns a matcher that matches when the method it is evaluated for is never executed.
返回一个匹配器，当被评定的方法从未执行时匹配成功。

每个测试都在独立的PHP进程中运行。
Run tests in strict mode (same as using <l0>--report-useless-tests</l0>, <l1>--strict-coverage</l1>, <l2>--disallow-test-output</l2>, and <l3>--enforce-time-limit</l3>). See <x4/> for details.
以严格模式运行测试（效果的功能等同于同时使用 <l0>--report-useless-tests</l0>、<l1>--strict-coverage</l1>、<l2>--disallow-test-output</l2> 和 <l3>--enforce-time-limit</l3>）。详情参见<x4/>。

以严格模式运行测试。当启用严格模式时：
Runs the tests that are provided by the class <l0>UnitTest</l0>. This class is expected to be declared in the <f1>UnitTest.php</f1> sourcefile.
运行由 <l0>UnitTest</l0> 类提供的测试。这个类应当在 <f1>UnitTest.php</f1> 源文件中声明。
Runs the tests that are provided by the class <l0>UnitTest</l0>. This class is expected to be declared in the specified sourcefile.
运行由 <l0>UnitTest</l0> 类提供的测试。这个类应当在指定的源文件中声明。
