Selenium RC
Selenium RC integration for PHPUnit.
将 Selenium RC 集成于 PHPUnit。
Selenium Server
Selenium Server
Selenium Server API: Setup
Selenium Server API: 设置
Set <l0>convertErrorsToExceptions</l0> to <l1>false</l1> to disable this feature.
将 <l0>convertErrorsToExceptions</l0> 设为 <l1>false</l1> 可以禁用此功能。
Set the base URL for the tests.
设置测试的基准 URL (base URL)。
Set the browser to be used by the Selenium Server server.
设置用于 Selenium Server 服务器的浏览器。
Set the expected <l0>$exceptionName</l0>, <l1>$exceptionMessage</l1>, and <l2>$exceptionCode</l2>.
设定预期的 <l0>$exceptionName</l0>、<l1>$exceptionMessage</l1> 和 <l2>$exceptionCode</l2>。
Set the expected <l0>$exceptionName</l0>, <l1>$exceptionMessageRegExp</l1>, and <l2>$exceptionCode</l2>.
设定预期的 <l0>$exceptionName</l0>、<l1>$exceptionMessageRegExp</l1> 和 <l2>$exceptionCode</l2>。
Set the hostname for the connection to the Selenium Server server.
设定 Selenium Server 服务器连接的主机名。
Set the number of seconds the Selenium Server client should sleep between sending action commands to the Selenium Server server.
设定 Selenium Server 客户端向 Selenium Server 服务器端发送动作多个命令之间需要休眠的秒数
Set the port for the connection to the Selenium Server server.
设定 Selenium Server 服务器连接的端口号。
Set the timeout for the connection to the Selenium Server server.
设定 Selenium Server 服务器连接的超时时间。
Set up fixture
建立基境(fixture)
Set up the expectation that the output is equal to an <l0>$expectedString</l0>.
设置输出预期为输出应当与 <l0>$expectedString</l0> 字符串相等。
Set up the expectation that the output matches a <l0>$regularExpression</l0>.
设置输出预期为输出应当匹配正则表达式 <l0>$regularExpression</l0>。
Sets the value of the given PHP configuration option.
设置指定的 PHP 配置选项的值。
Sets up a callback that is used to, for instance, normalize the actual output.
设置回调函数，用来做诸如将实际输出规范化之类的动作。
Setting PHP INI settings, Constants and Global Variables
设定 PHP INI 设置、常量、全局变量
Setting the <l0>$backupGlobalsBlacklist</l0> property inside e.g. the <l1>setUp()</l1> method has no effect.
在方法（例如 <l1>setUp()</l1> 方法）内对 <l0>$backupGlobalsBlacklist</l0> 属性进行设置是无效的。
Setting the <l0>$backupStaticAttributesBlacklist</l0> property inside e.g. the <l1>setUp()</l1> method has no effect.
在方法（例如 <l1>setUp()</l1> ）内对 <l0>$backupStaticAttributesBlacklist</l0> 属性进行设置是无效的。
Setting up multiple browser configurations
设置多个浏览器配置

Since PHPUnit <l0>3.7.2</l0> we turned off the caching of tokenized files by default. When processing code coverage reports for big projects this cache consumed a lot of memory and due to the change in whitelist behavior it was problematic for folks with code bases with more than a couple of thousand classes.
从 PHPUnit <l0>3.7.2</l0> 开始，对已完成词法分析(tokenized)的文件的缓存默认关闭。在处理大型项目的代码覆盖率报告时，这个缓存会消耗大量内存，并且由于白名单行为的变化，对于那些代码基于成千上万个类的人来说会很成问题。
Since each test completely cleans the database you are not even required to re-create the database for each test-run. A permanently available database works perfectly.
由于每个测试都会彻底清空数据库，因此无须为每个测试重新创建数据库。持久可用的数据库同样能够完美工作。
Since the filesystem operations do not operate on the real filesystem anymore, cleanup operations in a <l0>tearDown()</l0> method are no longer required.
由于文件系统操作不再对真实文件系统进行操作，<l0>tearDown()</l0> 方法中的清理操作不再需要了。

Since there is always a first test that runs against the database you do not know exactly if there is already data in the tables. PHPUnit will execute a TRUNCATE against all the tables you specified to reset their status to empty.
由于总是会有某个测试运行在并不确定表中是否有数据的数据库上，PHPUnit 在所有指定表上执行 TRUNCATE 操作来把它们清空。
Skeleton Generator
骨架(Skeleton)生成器
Skipping Tests
跳过测试
Skipping Tests using @requires
用 @requires 来跳过测试
Skipping a test
跳过某个测试
Skipping test cases using @requires
用 @requires 来跳过测试

So far, we only have two tests for the <l0>array</l0> built-in and the <l1>count()</l1> function. When we start to test the numerous <l2>array_*()</l2> functions PHP offers, we will need to write a test for each of them. We could write the infrastructure for all these tests from scratch. However, it is much better to write a testing infrastructure once and then write only the unique parts of each test. PHPUnit is such an infrastructure.

到目前为止，我们还只有2个测试，用于PHP内建的 <l0>array</l0> 和 <l1>count()</l1> 函数。当我们开始对 PHP 提供的为数众多的 <l2>array_*()</l2> 函数进行测试时，需要为它们逐一编写测试。对于这些测试，可以每一个都从头编写相关的基础部分。但是，显然有更好的办法：一次性的编写一套通用的基础，然后每个测试都只要编写它特有的部分即可。PHPUnit 就是这样一套基础。
So if it's not about testing, what's it about?
这么说来它不是关于测试的，那么是关于什么的？
Software Metrics for Code Coverage
用于代码覆盖率的软件衡量标准

Sometimes a stubbed method should return different values depending on a predefined list of arguments. You can use <l0>returnValueMap()</l0> to create a map that associates arguments with corresponding return values. See <x1/> for an example.
有时候，上桩的方法需要根据预定义的参数清单来返回不同的值。可以用 <l0>returnValueMap()</l0> 方法将参数和相应的返回值关联起来建立映射。范例参见<x1/>。

Sometimes it is just plain hard to test the system under test (SUT) because it depends on other components that cannot be used in the test environment. This could be because they aren't available, they will not return the results needed for the test or because executing them would have undesirable side effects. In other cases, our test strategy requires us to have more control or visibility of the internal behavior of the SUT.
有时候对被测系统(SUT)进行测试是很困难的，因为它依赖于其他无法在测试环境中使用的组件。这有可能是因为这些组件不可用，它们不会返回测试所需要的结果，或者执行它们会有不良副作用。在其他情况下，我们的测试策略要求对被测系统的内部行为有更多控制或更多可见性。

Sometimes you have blocks of code that you cannot test and that you may want to ignore during code coverage analysis. PHPUnit lets you do this using the <l0>@codeCoverageIgnore</l0>, <l1>@codeCoverageIgnoreStart</l1> and <l2>@codeCoverageIgnoreEnd</l2> annotations as shown in <x3/>.
有时，一些代码块是无法对其进行测试的，因此希望在代码覆盖率分析中忽略它们。在 PHPUnit 中可以用 <l0>@codeCoverageIgnore</l0>、<l1>@codeCoverageIgnoreStart</l1> 与 <l2>@codeCoverageIgnoreEnd</l2> 标注来做到这点，如<x3/>中所示。

Sometimes you want to assert that the execution of a method, for instance, generates an expected output (via <l0>echo</l0> or <l1>print</l1>, for example). The <l2>PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase</l2> class uses PHP's <u3>Output Buffering</u3> feature to provide the functionality that is necessary for this.
有时候，想要断言（比如说）某方法的运行过程中生成了预期的输出（例如，通过 <l0>echo</l0> 或 <l1>print</l1>）。<l2>PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase</l2> 类使用 PHP 的 <u3>输出缓冲</u3> 特性来为此提供必要的功能支持。

Sometimes you want to return one of the arguments of a method call (unchanged) as the result of a stubbed method call. <x0/> shows how you can achieve this using <l1>returnArgument()</l1> instead of <l2>returnValue()</l2>.
有时想要将（未改变的）方法调用时所使用的参数之一作为桩件的方法的调用结果来返回。 <x0/>展示了如何用 <l1>returnArgument()</l1> 代替 <l2>returnValue()</l2> 来做到这点。

Specifies the <l0>PHPUnit_Runner_TestSuiteLoader</l0> implementation to use.
指定要使用的 <l0>PHPUnit_Runner_TestSuiteLoader</l0> 实现。
Specifies the result printer to use. The printer class must extend <l0>PHPUnit_Util_Printer</l0> and implement the <l1>PHPUnit_Framework_TestListener</l1> interface.
指定要使用的结果输出器(printer)。输出器类必须扩展 <l0>PHPUnit_Util_Printer</l0> 并且实现 <l1>PHPUnit_Framework_TestListener</l1> 接口。

用表名称来指定数据库中的一个或多个表（实际上是指定了一个数据集）

用你喜欢的格式（YAML、XML等等）来指定预期数据集

Test code should be as short and precise as possible for several reasons:
测试代码应当尽可能简短精确，这有若干原因：
Test code should contain no extraneous overhead so that the test itself does not get lost in noise that surrounds it.
测试代码不应当引入额外的开销，避免淹没测试内容本身。
Test listeners trigger one autoload call
测试监听器触发了一次对自动加载(autoload)的调用
Test missing to achieve complete code coverage
达成完全覆盖所缺少的测试
Test with multiple dependencies
有多重依赖的测试
Test-Driven Development
Test-Driven Development （测试驱动开发）
Test-First Programming
Test-First Programming （测试优先编程）

Test-First Programming, which is part of Extreme Programming and Test-Driven Development, builds upon this idea and takes it to the extreme. With today's computational power, we have the opportunity to run thousands of tests thousands of times per day. We can use the feedback from all of these tests to program in small steps, each of which carries with it the assurance of a new automated test in addition to all the tests that have come before. The tests are like pitons, assuring you that, no matter what happens, once you have made progress you can only fall so far.
测试优先编程是极限编程和测试驱动开发的组成部分，它正是建立在这个观念之上，并将其推至极致。在现今的计算能力下，我们有机会每天都将成千上万测试运行成千上万遍。我们可以利用这些测试带来的反馈，用很小的步调进行编程，伴随着每个步调，都往现有的那些测试中再加上一个新的自动测试来为其担保。这些测试就像登山时使用的岩钉，一旦钉下，就能为你提供保证，不管发生了什么情况，你顶多下跌到岩钉处就会停住。

Testing gives code authors and reviewers confidence that patches produce the correct results.
进行测试让代码的作者和评审者对补丁能够产生正确的结果有信心。
Testing provides a good way to catch regressions quickly, and to make sure that no regression will be repeated twice.
进行测试提供了一种良好的方法来快速捕捉退步(Regression)，并且能用来保证退步不会重复出现。
Testing return values of code that uses PHP Errors
对会引发PHP 错误的代码的返回值进行测试
Testing that a method gets called once and with a specified argument
测试某个方法会以特定参数被调用一次
Testing that a method gets called once and with the identical object as was passed
测试某个方法将会被调用一次，并且以某个特定对象作为参数。
Testing that a method gets called two times with specific arguments.
测试某个方法将会以特定参数被调用二次
Testing that a method gets called with a number of arguments constrained in different ways
测试某个方法将会以特定数量的参数进行调用，并且对各个参数以多种方式进行约束
Testing the concrete methods of a trait
对特质的具体方法进行测试
Testing the concrete methods of an abstract class
对抽象类的具体方法进行测试

Testing the database requires you to hook into at least the setup and teardown to clean-up and write the required fixture data into your tables. However the database extension has good reason to revert the four stages in a database test to resemble the following workflow that is executed for each single test:
对数据库进行测试至少要处理建立与拆除的步骤，在其中完成清理工作，并将所需的基境数据写入表内。然而对于数据库扩展模块而言，在数据库测试中有很好的理由将这四个步骤还原成类似下面这样的工作流程，这个流程对于每个测试都会完整执行：

Testing the database requires you to hook into at least the setup and teardown to clean-up and write the required fixture data into your tables. However, the database extension has good reason to revert the four stages in a database test to resemble the following workflow that is executed for each single test:
对数据库进行测试至少要处理建立与拆除的步骤，在其中完成清理工作，并将所需的基境数据写入表内。因而，对于数据库扩展模块而言，在数据库测试中有很好的理由将这四个步骤还原成类似下面这样的工作流程，这个流程对于每个测试都会完整执行：
Testing the output of a function or method
对函数或方法的输出进行测试

Testing with PHPUnit is not a totally different activity from what you should already be doing. It is just a different way of doing it. The difference is between <e0>testing</e0>, that is, checking that your program behaves as expected, and <e1>performing a battery of tests</e1>, runnable code-fragments that automatically test the correctness of parts (units) of the software. These runnable code-fragments are called unit tests.
使用 PHPUnit 进行测试与过往的做法并没有本质区别，只是方式有所不同。二者的区别在于<e0>测试</e0>与<e1>执行一系列测试</e1>，前者检查软件的行为是否符合预期，后者则利用一些可运行的代码片段来自动测试软件各个部分（单元）的正确性。这些可运行的代码片段称为单元测试。

Tests are expected to be fine-grained, testing one aspect of one object. Hence, the first time a test fails, execution of the test halts, and PHPUnit reports the failure. It is an art to test by running in many small tests. Fine-grained tests improve the overall design of the system.
测试应当有良好的粒度划分，每个测试应当只测试一个对象的一个方面。因此，第一个失败的测试就会中止测试的执行，同时 PHPUnit 会报告此错误。通过运行大量小测试来对软件进行测试是一种艺术。具有良好粒度划分的测试能够帮助改善系统的总体设计。

Tests can be selected for execution based on groups using the <l0>--group</l0> and <l1>--exclude-group</l1> options of the command-line test runner or using the respective directives of the XML configuration file.
测试可以基于组来选择性的执行，使用命令行测试执行器的 <l0>--group</l0> and <l1>--exclude-group</l1> 选项，或者使用对应的 XML 配置文件指令。

Tests do not generally require all the flexibility of a programming language. Many testing tools provide their own scripting language that only includes the minimum necessary features for writing tests. The resulting tests are easy to read and write because they have no noise to distract you from the content of the tests. However, learning yet another programming language and set of programming tools is inconvenient and clutters the mind.
一般来说，测试并不需要编程语言的全部灵活性。许多测试工具都提供了自有的脚本语言，这些脚本语言只包含编写测试所必须的那些特性。这样得到的测试易于阅读也易于编写，因为没有会让你从测试内容本身分心的干扰内容。但是，学习其他编程语言和编程工具集并不方便，并且还会干扰思维。
Tests for the BankAccount class
BankAccount 类的测试
Tests should run fast so they can be run hundreds or thousands of times a day.
测试需要运行的很快，这样才能每天都运行成百上千次。
Tests that emit output will fail.
本身产生输出的测试将会失败。
Tests that specify which method they want to cover
在测试中指明欲覆盖哪些方法
Tests with no assertions will fail and will not generate code coverage information.
含断言的错误将会失败，并且不会生成代码覆盖率信息。

The <c0>addRiskyTest()</c0> was added to the <c1>PHPUnit_Framework_TestListener</c1> interface. Classes that implement this interface have to implement this new method. This is the reason why PHPStorm 7 is not compatible with PHPUnit 4, for instance.
<c0>addRiskyTest()</c0> 方法已添加到 <c1>PHPUnit_Framework_TestListener</c1> 接口。所有实现了本方法的类必须实现此新方法。这正式 PHPStorm 7 与 PHPUnit 4 不兼容的原因。
The <e0>Branch Coverage</e0> software metric measures whether the boolean expression of each control structure evaluated to both <l1>true</l1> and <l2>false</l2> while running the test suite.
<e0>分支覆盖率(Branch Coverage)</e0>按控制结构的分支进行计量。测试套件运行时每个控制结构的布尔表达式求值为 <l1>true</l1> 和 <l2>false</l2> 各自计为一个分支。

The <e0>Change Risk Anti-Patterns (CRAP) Index</e0> is calculated based on the cyclomatic complexity and code coverage of a unit of code. Code that is not too complex and has an adequate test coverage will have a low CRAP index. The CRAP index can be lowered by writing tests and by refactoring the code to lower its complexity.
<e0>变更风险反模式(CRAP)指数(Change Risk Anti-Patterns (CRAP) Index)</e0>是基于代码单元的圈复杂度(cyclomatic complexity)与代码覆盖率计算得出的。不太复杂并具有恰当测试覆盖率的代码将得出较低的CRAP指数。可以通过编写测试或重构代码来降低其复杂性的方式来降低CRAP指数。

The <e0>Class and Trait Coverage</e0> software metric measures whether each method of a class or trait is covered. PHP_CodeCoverage only considers a class or trait as covered when all of its methods are covered.
<e0>类与特质覆盖率(Class and Trait Coverage)</e0>按单个类或特质的所有方法是否全部已覆盖进行计量。仅当一个类或性状的所有方法全部已覆盖时 PHP_CodeCoverage 才将其视为已覆盖。

The <e0>Function and Method Coverage</e0> software metric measures whether each function or method has been invoked. PHP_CodeCoverage only considers a function or method as covered when all of its executable lines are covered.
<e0>函数与方法覆盖率(Function and Method Coverage)</e0>按单个函数或方法是否已调用到进行计量。仅当函数或方法的所有可执行行全部已覆盖时 PHP_CodeCoverage 才将其视为已覆盖。
The <e0>Line Coverage</e0> software metric measures whether each executable line was executed.
<e0>行覆盖率(Line Coverage)</e0>按单个可执行行是否已执行到进行计量。

The <e0>Opcode Coverage</e0> software metric measures whether each opcode of a function or method has been executed while running the test suite. A line of code usually compiles into more than one opcode. Line Coverage regards a line of code as covered as soon as one of its opcodes is executed.
<e0>Opcode 覆盖率</e0>按函数或方法对应的每条 opcode 在运行测试套件时是否执行到进行计量。一行（PHP的）代码通常会编译得到多条 opcode。进行行覆盖率计量时，只要其中任何一条 opcode 被执行就视为此行已覆盖。
The <e0>Opcode Coverage</e0>, <e1>Branch Coverage</e1>, and <e2>Path Coverage</e2> software metrics are not yet supported by PHP_CodeCoverage.
目前 PHP_CodeCoverage 尚不支持 <e0>Opcode覆盖率</e0>、<e1>分支覆盖率</e1> 及 <e2>路径覆盖率</e2>。

The <e0>Path Coverage</e0> software metric measures whether each of the possible execution paths in a function or method has been followed while running the test suite. An execution path is a unique sequence of branches from the entry of the function or method to its exit.
<e0>路径覆盖率(Path Coverage)</e0>按测试套件运行时函数或者方法内部所经历的执行路径进行计量。一个执行路径指的是从进入函数或方法一直到离开的过程中经过各个分支的特定序列。
The <l0>$GLOBALS</l0> variable is a so-called <e1>super-global</e1> variable.
<l0>$GLOBALS</l0>这个变量是一种被称为<e1>超全局</e1>变量的变量。

The <l0>$index</l0> parameter for the <l1>at()</l1> matcher refers to the index, starting at zero, in <e2>all method invocations</e2> for a given mock object. Exercise caution when using this matcher as it can lead to brittle tests which are too closely tied to specific implementation details.
<l1>at()</l1> 匹配器的 <l0>$index</l0> 参数指的是对给定仿件对象的<e2>所有方法的调用</e2>的索引，从零开始。使用这个匹配器要谨慎，因为它可能导致测试由于与具体的实现细节过分紧密绑定而变得脆弱。
The <l0><filter></l0> element and its children can be used to configure the blacklist and whitelist for the code coverage reporting.
<l0><filter></l0> 元素及其子元素用于为代码覆盖率报告配置黑名单与白名单。
The <l0><filter></l0> element and its children can be used to configure the whitelist for the code coverage reporting.
<l0><filter></l0> 元素及其子元素用于配置代码覆盖率报告所使用的白名单。

The <l0><groups></l0> element and its <l1><include></l1>, <l2><exclude></l2>, and <l3><group></l3> children can be used to select groups of tests marked with the <l4>@group</l4> annotation (documented in <x5/>) that should (not) be run.
<l0><groups></l0> 元素及其 <l1><include></l1>、<l2><exclude></l2>、<l3><group></l3> 子元素用于从带有 <l4>@group</l4> 标注（相关文档参见 <x5/>）的测试中选择需要运行（或不运行）的分组。
The <l0><listeners></l0> element and its <l1><listener></l1> children can be used to attach additional test listeners to the test execution.
<l0><listeners></l0> 元素及其 <l1><listener></l1> 子元素用于在测试执行期间附加额外的测试监听器。
The <l0><logging></l0> element and its <l1><log></l1> children can be used to configure the logging of the test execution.
<l0><logging></l0> 元素及其 <l1><log></l1> 子元素用于配置测试执行期间的日志记录。
The <l0><php></l0> element and its children can be used to configure PHP settings, constants, and global variables. It can also be used to prepend the <l1>include_path</l1>.
<l0><php></l0> 元素及其子元素用于配置 PHP 设置、常量以及全局变量。同时也可用于向 <l1>include_path</l1> 前部置入内容。
The <l0><selenium></l0> element and its <l1><browser></l1> children can be used to configure a list of Selenium RC servers.
<l0><selenium></l0> 元素及其 <l1><browser></l1> 子元素用于配置 Selenium RC 服务器列表。
The <l0><testsuites></l0> element and its one or more <l1><testsuite></l1> children can be used to compose a test suite out of test suites and test cases.
带有一个或多个 <l1><testsuite></l1> 子元素的 <l0><testsuites></l0> 元素用于将测试套件及测试用例组合出新的测试套件。
The <l0>@after</l0> annotation can be used to specify methods that should be called after each test method in a test case class.
<l0>@after</l0> 标注用于指明此方法应当在测试用例类中的每个测试方法运行完成之后调用。
The <l0>@afterClass</l0> annotation can be used to specify static methods that should be called after all test methods in a test class have been run to clean up shared fixtures.
<l0>@afterClass</l0> 标注用于指明此静态方法应该于测试类中的所有测试方法都运行完成之后调用，用于清理共享基境。
The <l0>@author</l0> annotation is an alias for <l1>@group</l1> allowing to filter tests based on their authors.
<l0>@author</l0> 标注是 <l1>@group</l1> 的一个别名，允许按作者来筛选测试。
The <l0>@author</l0> annotation is an alias for the <l1>@group</l1> annotation (see <x2/>) and allows to filter tests based on their authors.
<l0>@author</l0> 标注是 <l1>@group</l1> 标注（参见 <x2/>）的别名，允许基于作者对测试进行过滤。
The <l0>@backupGlobals</l0> annotation can also be used on the test method level. This allows for a fine-grained configuration of the backup and restore operations:
<l0>@backupGlobals</l0> 标注也可以用在测试方法这一级别。这样可以对备份与还原操作进行更细粒度的配置：

The <l0>@backupGlobals</l0> annotation that is discussed in <x1/> can be used to control the backup and restore operations for global variables. Alternatively, you can provide a blacklist of global variables that are to be excluded from the backup and restore operations like this
在<x1/>中所讨论的 <l0>@backupGlobals</l0> 标注可以用来控制对全局变量的备份与还原操作。另外，还可以提供一个全局变量的黑名单，黑名单中的全局变量将被排除于备份与还原操作之外，就像这样：
The <l0>@backupStaticAttributes</l0> annotation can also be used on the test method level. This allows for a fine-grained configuration of the backup and restore operations:
<l0>@backupStaticAttributes</l0> 标注也可以用在测试方法这一级别。这样可以对备份与还原操作进行更细粒度的配置：

The <l0>@backupStaticAttributes</l0> annotation can be used to back up all static property values in all declared classes before each test and restore them afterwards. It may be used at the test case class or test method level:
如果指定了 <l0>@backupStaticAttributes</l0> 标注，那么将在每个测试之前备份所有已声明的类的静态属性的值，并在测试完成之后全部恢复。它可以用在测试用例类或测试方法级别：
The <l0>@backupStaticAttributes</l0> annotation discussed in <x1/> can be used to back up all static property values in all declared classes before each test and restore them afterwards.
在 <x1/> 中提到的 <l0>@backupStaticAttributes</l0> 标注可以用于在每个测试之前备份所有已声明类的静态属性值并在其后恢复。

The <l0>@backupStaticAttributes</l0> annotation that is discussed in <x1/> can be used to control the backup and restore operations for static attributes. Alternatively, you can provide a blacklist of static attributes that are to be excluded from the backup and restore operations like this
在 <x1/> 中所讨论的 <l0>@backupStaticAttributes</l0> 标注可以用来控制对静态属性的备份与还原操作。另外，还可以提供一个静态属性的黑名单，黑名单中的静态属性将被排除于备份与还原操作之外，就像这样：

The <l0>@backupStaticAttributes</l0> operation is executed before a test method, but only if it is enabled. If a static value was changed by a previously executed test that did not have <l1>@backupStaticAttributes</l1> enabled, then that value will be backed up and restored — not the originally declared default value. PHP does not record the originally declared default value of any static variable.
只有启用了 <l0>@backupStaticAttributes</l0> 的测试方法才会在方法之前执行此操作。如果在此之前运行的某个没有启用 <l1>@backupStaticAttributes</l1> 的测试方法改变了静态属性的值，那么被备份及还原的将会是这个改变后的值——而非初始声明时提供的默认值。PHP 并不额外记录任何静态变量的声明时提供的初始默认值。
The <l0>@before</l0> annotation can be used to specify methods that should be called before each test method in a test case class.
<l0>@before</l0> 标注用于指明此方法应当在测试用例类中的每个测试方法开始运行之前调用。
The <l0>@beforeClass</l0> annotation can be used to specify static methods that should be called before any test methods in a test class are run to set up shared fixtures.
<l0>@beforeClass</l0> 标注用于指明此静态方法应该于测试类中的所有测试方法都运行完成之后调用，用于建立共享基境。
The <l0>@codeCoverageIgnore</l0>, <l1>@codeCoverageIgnoreStart</l1> and <l2>@codeCoverageIgnoreEnd</l2> annotations can be used to exclude lines of code from the coverage analysis.
<l0>@codeCoverageIgnore</l0>, <l1>@codeCoverageIgnoreStart</l1> and <l2>@codeCoverageIgnoreEnd</l2> 标注用于从覆盖率分析中排除掉某些代码行。

The <l0>@covers</l0> annotation (see <x1/>) can be used in the test code to specify which method(s) a test method wants to test. If provided, only the code coverage information for the specified method(s) will be considered. <x2/> shows an example.
<l0>@covers</l0> 标注（参见 <x1/>）可以用在测试代码中来指明测试方法想要对哪些方法进行测试。如果提供了这个信息，则只有指定方法的代码覆盖率信息会被统计。 <x2/>展示了一个例子。
The <l0>@covers</l0> annotation can be used in the test code to specify which method(s) a test method wants to test:
在测试代码中用 <l0>@covers</l0> 标注来指明测试方法想要对哪些方法进行测试：
The <l0>@coversDefaultClass</l0> annotation can be used to specify a default namespace or class name so long names don't need to be repeated for every <l1>@covers</l1> annotation. See <x2/>.
<l0>@coversDefaultClass</l0> 标注用于指定一个默认的命名空间或类名，这样就不用在每个 <l1>@covers</l1> 标注中重复长名称。参见<x2/>。
The <l0>@coversDefaultClass</l0> annotation can be used to specify a default namespace or class name. That way long names don't need to be repeated for every <l1>@covers</l1> annotation. See <x2/>.
<l0>@coversDefaultClass</l0> 标注用于指定一个默认的命名空间或类名，这样就不用在每个 <l1>@covers</l1> 标注中重复长名称。参见<x2/>。
The <l0>@coversNothing</l0> annotation can be used in the test code to specify that no code coverage information will be recorded for the annotated test case.
在测试代码中用 <l0>@coversNothing</l0> 标注来指明所标注的测试用例不需要记录任何代码覆盖率信息。

The <l0>@expectedExceptionCode</l0> annotation, in conjunction with the <l1>@expectedException</l1> allows making assertions on the error code of a thrown exception thus being able to narrow down a specific exception.
将 <l0>@expectedExceptionCode</l0> 标注与 <l1>@expectedException</l1> 联合使用，可以对抛出异常的代码作出断言，这样可以缩小具体异常的范围。
The <l0>@expectedExceptionMessage</l0> annotation works similar to <l1>@expectedExceptionCode</l1> as it lets you make an assertion on the error message of an exception.
<l0>@expectedExceptionMessage</l0> 标注的运作方式类似于 <l1>@expectedExceptionCode</l1> ，用它可以对异常的错误讯息作出断言。
The <l0>@large</l0> annotation is an alias for <l1>@group large</l1>.
<l0>@large</l0> 标注是 <l1>@group large</l1> 的别名。
The <l0>@medium</l0> annotation is an alias for <l1>@group medium</l1>. A medium test must not depend on a test marked as <l2>@large</l2>.
<l0>@medium</l0> 标注是 <l1>@group medium</l1> 的别名。中型(medium)测试不能依赖于标记为 <l2>@large</l2> 的测试。
The <l0>@requires</l0> annotation can be used skip tests when common preconditions, like the PHP Version or installed extensions, are not met.
<l0>@requires</l0> 标注用于在常见前提条件（例如 PHP 版本或所安装的扩展）不满足时跳过测试。
The <l0>@small</l0> annotation is an alias for <l1>@group small</l1>. A small test must not depend on a test marked as <l2>@medium</l2> or <l3>@large</l3>.
<l0>@small</l0> 标注是 <l1>@group small</l1> 的别名。小型(small)测试不能依赖于标记为 <l2>@medium</l2> 或 <l3>@large</l3> 的测试。

The <l0>@uses</l0> annotation specifies code which will be executed by a test, but is not intended to be covered by the test. A good example is a value object which is necessary for testing a unit of code.
<l0>@uses</l0> 标注用来指明那些将会在测试中执行到但同时又不打算让其被测试所覆盖的代码。在对代码单元进行测试时所必须的值对象就是个很好的例子。
The <l0>PHPUnit_Extensions_Selenium2TestCase</l0> test case lets you use the WebDriver API (partially implemented).
通过 <l0>PHPUnit_Extensions_Selenium2TestCase</l0> 测试用例能够使用 WebDriver API（部分实现）。
The <l0>PHPUnit_Extensions_SeleniumTestCase</l0> test case extension implements the client/server protocol to talk to Selenium Server as well as specialized assertion methods for web testing.
<l0>PHPUnit_Extensions_SeleniumTestCase</l0> 测试用例扩展实现了客户端/服务器端协议来与 Selenium Server 沟通，同时还为 web 测试实现了一些特殊的断言方法。

The <l0>PHPUnit_Extensions_Story_TestCase</l0> class adds a story framework that faciliates the definition of a <u1>Domain-Specific Language</u1> for Behaviour-Driven Development. It can be installed like this:
<l0>PHPUnit_Extensions_Story_TestCase</l0> 类添加了一个便于为行为驱动开发定义<u1>特定领域语言(Domain-Specific Language)</u1>的故事框架。他可以这样安装：

The <l0>PHPUnit_Framework_Test</l0> interface is narrow and easy to implement. You can write an implementation of <l1>PHPUnit_Framework_Test</l1> that is simpler than <l2>PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase</l2> and that runs <e3>data-driven tests</e3>, for instance.
<l0>PHPUnit_Framework_Test</l0> 接口是比较狭义的，十分容易实现。举例来说，你可以自行为 <l1>PHPUnit_Framework_Test</l1> 编写一个类似于 <l2>PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase</l2> 的实现来运行<e3>数据驱动测试</e3>。

The <l0>callback()</l0> constraint can be used for more complex argument verification. This constraint takes a PHP callback as its only argument. The PHP callback will receive the argument to be verified as its only argument and should return <l1>TRUE</l1> if the argument passes verification and <l2>FALSE</l2> otherwise.
<l0>callback()</l0> 约束用来进行更加复杂的参数校验。此约束的唯一参数是一个 PHP 回调项(callback)。此 PHP 回调项接受需要校验的参数作为其唯一参数，并应当在参数通过校验时返回 <l1>TRUE</l1>，否则返回 <l2>FALSE</l2>。

The <l0>charset</l0>, <l1>highlight</l1>, <l2>lowUpperBound</l2>, <l3>highLowerBound</l3>, <l4>logIncompleteSkipped</l4> and <l5>showUncoveredFiles</l5> attributes have no equivalent TextUI test runner option.
<l0>charset</l0>、<l1>highlight</l1>、<l2>lowUpperBound</l2>、<l3>highLowerBound</l3>、<l4>logIncompleteSkipped</l4> 和 <l5>showUncoveredFiles</l5> 属性没有等价的 TextUI 测试执行器选项。
The <l0>createDataSet()</l0> method creates a Database (DB) DataSet as described in the DataSet implementations section.
<l0>createDataSet()</l0> 方法创建一个在数据集实现一节描述过的 Database (DB) DataSet（数据库数据集）。

The <l0>createQueryTable()</l0> method can be used to create instances of a QueryTable, give them a result name and SQL query. This is a handy method when it comes to result/table assertions as will be shown in the next section on the Database Assertions API.
<l0>createQueryTable()</l0> 方法用于创建 QueryTable 的实例，需要为其指定结果名称和所使用的 SQL 查询。当涉及到结果/表的断言（如后面关于数据库断言 API 那一节所示）时，这个方法会很方便。

The <l0>getDataSet()</l0> method defines how the initial state of the database should look before each test is executed. The state of a database is abstracted through the concepts DataSet and DataTable both being represented by the interfaces <l1>PHPUnit_Extensions_Database_DataSet_IDataSet</l1> and <l2>PHPUnit_Extensions_Database_DataSet_IDataTable</l2>. The next section will describe in detail how these concepts work and what the benefits are for using them in database testing.

<l0>getDataSet()</l0> 方法定义了在每个测试执行之前的数据库初始状态应该是什么样。数据库的状态通过由 <l1>PHPUnit_Extensions_Database_DataSet_IDataSet</l1> 所代表的 DataSet（数据集）和由 <l2>PHPUnit_Extensions_Database_DataSet_IDataTable</l2>所代表的 DataTable（数据表）这两个概念进行抽象。下一节将详细讲述这些概念是如何运作的以及在数据库测试中使用它们有什么好处。

The <l0>getMock($className)</l0> method provided by PHPUnit can be used in a test to automatically generate an object that can act as a test double for the specified original class. This test double object can be used in every context where an object of the original class is expected.
PHPUnit 提供的 <l0>getMock($className)</l0> 方法可以在测试中用来自动生成一个对象，它可以充当指定原版类的测试替身。在任何预期使用原始类的实例对象的上下文中都可以使用这个测试对象类来代替。

The <l0>getMockBuilder($type)</l0> method provided by PHPUnit can be used in a test to automatically generate an object that can act as a test double for the specified original type (interface or class name). This test double object can be used in every context where an object of the original type is expected or required.
PHPUnit 提供的 <l0>getMockBuilder($type)</l0> 方法可以在测试中用来自动生成对象，此对象可以充当任意指定原版类型（接口或类名）的测试替身。在任何预期或要求使用原版类的实例对象的上下文中都可以使用这个测试替身对象来代替。

The <l0>getMockForAbstractClass()</l0> method returns a mock object for an abstract class. All abstract methods of the given abstract class are mocked. This allows for testing the concrete methods of an abstract class.
<l0>getMockForAbstractClass()</l0> 方法返回一个抽象类的仿件对象。给定抽象类的所有抽象方法将都被模仿。这样就能对抽象类的具体方法进行测试。
The <l0>getMockForTrait()</l0> method returns a mock object that uses a specified trait. All abstract methods of the given trait are mocked. This allows for testing the concrete methods of a trait.
<l0>getMockForTrait()</l0> 方法返回一个使用了特定特质(trait)的仿件对象。给定特质的所有抽象方法将都被模仿。这样就能对特质的具体方法进行测试。
The <l0>getRowCount()</l0> method is a convienent way to access the number of rows in a table, optionally filtered by an additional where clause. This can be used with a simple equality assertion:
<l0>getRowCount()</l0> 方法提供了一种方便的方式来取得表中的行数，并且还可以选择附加一个 WHERE 子句来在计数前对数据行进行过滤。它可以和一个简单的相等断言合用：
The <l0>lowUpperBound</l0>, <l1>highLowerBound</l1>, <l2>logIncompleteSkipped</l2> and <l3>showUncoveredFiles</l3> attributes have no equivalent TextUI test runner option.
<l0>lowUpperBound</l0>、<l1>highLowerBound</l1>、<l2>logIncompleteSkipped</l2> 及 <l3>showUncoveredFiles</l3> 属性没有等价的 TextUI 测试执行器选项。
The <l0>phpVersionOperator</l0> attribute is optional and defaults to <l1>>=</l1>.
<l0>phpVersionOperator</l0> 属性是可选的，其默认值为 <l1>>=</l1>。
The <l0>setUp()</l0> and <l1>tearDown()</l1> template methods are run once for each test method (and on fresh instances) of the test case class.
测试类的每个测试方法都会运行一次 <l0>setUp()</l0> 和 <l1>tearDown()</l1> 模板方法（同时，每个测试方法都是在一个全新的测试类实例上运行的）。

The <l0>with()</l0> method can take any number of arguments, corresponding to the number of arguments to the method being mocked. You can specify more advanced constraints on the method's arguments than a simple match.
<l0>with()</l0> 方法可以携带任何数量的参数，对应于被模仿的方法的参数数量。可以对方法的参数指定更加高等的约束而不仅是简单的匹配。

The <l0>withConsecutive()</l0> method can take any number of arrays of arguments, depending on the calls you want to test against. Each array is a list of constraints corresponding to the arguments of the method being mocked, like in <l1>with()</l1>.
<l0>withConsecutive()</l0> 方法可以接受任意多个数组作为参数，具体数量取决于欲测试的调用。每个数组都都是对被仿方法的相应参数的一组约束，就像 <l1>with()</l1> 中那样。

The <u0>Doctrine 2 project</u0>'s test suite, for example, currently has a test suite of about 1000 tests where nearly half of them accesses the database and still runs in 15 seconds against a MySQL database on a standard desktop computer.
以 <u0>Doctrine 2 </u0> 为例，此项目的测试套件目前包含了大约1000个测试，其中将近一半访问了数据库。但是在一台安装了MySQL的普通的台式机上，整个测试套件依然能在15秒钟内跑完。

<u0>Test Anything Protocol (TAP)</u0> 是 Perl 与测试模块之间所使用的简单的基于文本的接口。下面的例子展示了 <l1>ArrayTest</l1> 中的测试所生成的 TAP 日志文件：
The <u0>openssl</u0> extension is required for using the <l1>--self-update</l1> feature of the PHAR.
要使用 PHAR 的 <l1>--self-update</l1> 功能需要有 <u0>openssl</u0> 扩展。
The <u0>phar</u0> extension is required for using PHP Archives (PHAR).
要使用 PHP档案包(PHAR)需要有 <u0>phar</u0> 扩展。

The <u0>phar</u0> extension is required for using PHPUnit from a PHP Archive (PHAR). The <u1>openssl</u1> extension is required for the <l2>--self-update</l2> functionality of PHPUnit's PHAR to work. You need to configure <l3>suhosin.executor.include.whitelist = phar</l3> if you are using the <u4>Suhosin</u4> extension and would like to use PHPUnit from a PHP Archive (PHAR).

要以 PHP 档案包(PHAR)方式使用 PHPUnit，需要 <u0>phar</u0> 扩展。PHPUnit 的 PHAR 的 <l2>--self-update</l2> 功能需要 <u1>openssl</u1> 扩展才能工作。如果使用了 <u4>Suhosin</u4> 扩展并同时希望以 PHP 档案包(PHAR)方式使用 PHPUnit，需要配置 <l3>suhosin.executor.include.whitelist = phar</l3>。

The <u0>phar</u0> extension is required for using PHPUnit from a PHP Archive (PHAR). You need to configure <l1>suhosin.executor.include.whitelist = phar</l1> if you are using the <u2>Suhosin</u2> extension and would like to use PHPUnit from a PHP Archive (PHAR).
要以 PHP 档案包(PHAR)方式使用 PHPUnit，需要 <u0>phar</u0> 扩展。如果使用了 <u2>Suhosin</u2> 扩展并同时希望以 PHP 档案包(PHAR)方式使用 PHPUnit，需要配置 <l1>suhosin.executor.include.whitelist = phar</l1>。

The assertTrue() and isTrue() methods of the PHPUnit_Framework_Assert class
PHPUnit_Framework_Assert 类的 assertTrue() 与 isTrue() 方法
The attributes of the <l0><phpunit></l0> element can be used to configure PHPUnit's core functionality.
<l0><phpunit></l0> 元素的属性用于配置 PHPUnit 的核心功能。
The backup and restore operations for global variables and static class attributes use <l0>serialize()</l0> and <l1>unserialize()</l1>.
对全局变量和类的静态属性的备份与还原操作使用了 <l0>serialize()</l0> 与 <l1>unserialize()</l1>。
The backup and restore operations for global variables can be completely disabled for all tests of a test case class like this

The backup and restore operations for static attributes of classes can be completely disabled for all tests of a test case class like this

The bank account's balance cannot become negative.
银行账户的结余不能变成负的。
The bank account's initial balance must be zero.

The beauty of testing is found not in the effort but in the efficiency.
测试之美不在力，在乎效率之间也。

The blacklist is pre-filled with all sourcecode files of PHPUnit itself as well as the tests. When the whitelist is empty (default), blacklisting is used. When the whitelist is not empty, whitelisting is used. Each file on the whitelist is added to the code coverage report regardless of whether or not it was executed. All lines of such a file, including those that are not executable, are counted as not executed.
在黑名单中，会预先填充进 PHPUnit 自身的所有源代码文件，以及测试本身的所有源代码文件。如果白名单为空（默认情况），将会使用黑名单机制。如果白名单非空，那么将会使用白名单机制。白名单中的每个文件都会加入代码覆盖率报告中，不管它是否被执行到。此类文件的所有行，包括那些非可执行文件，都按未执行进行计数。
The bonus for that frame is the number of pins knocked down by the next roll.
本轮的奖励是下一次击球所击倒的球瓶数。
The bonus for that frame is the value of the next two balls rolled.
本轮的奖励是下两次击球所击倒的球瓶数。

类 <l0>PHPUnit_Extensions_OutputTestCase</l0> 已经移除。在 PHPUnit 3.6 中，用到这个类时会产生一个废弃提示。关于现在该如何测试输出参见 <x1/>。

代码传达其设计原则。

代码没有冗余。

代码所包含的类和方法的数量降至最低。
The code coverage report feature requires the <u0>Xdebug</u0> (2.1.3 or later) and <u1>tokenizer</u1> extensions. Generating XML reports requires the <u2>xmlwriter</u2> extension.
代码覆盖率分析报告功能需要 <u0>Xdebug</u0> （2.1.3以上）与 <u1>tokenizer</u1> 扩展。生成 XML 格式的报告需要有 <u2>xmlwriter</u2> 扩展。
The code coverage report feature requires the <u0>Xdebug</u0> (2.2.1 or later) and <u1>tokenizer</u1> extensions. Generating XML reports requires the <u2>xmlwriter</u2> extension.
代码覆盖率分析报告功能需要 <u0>Xdebug</u0> （2.2.1以上）与 <u1>tokenizer</u1> 扩展。生成 XML 格式的报告需要有 <u2>xmlwriter</u2> 扩展。

The code coverage report for our <l0>BankAccount</l0> example shows that we do not have any tests yet that call the <l1>setBalance()</l1>, <l2>depositMoney()</l2>, and <l3>withdrawMoney()</l3> methods with legal values. <x4/> shows a test that can be added to the <l5>BankAccountTest</l5> test case class to completely cover the <l6>BankAccount</l6> class.

对于 <l0>BankAccount</l0> 这个例子，代码覆盖率报告显示目前没有任何测试以合法值调用 <l1>setBalance()</l1>、<l2>depositMoney()</l2> 和 <l3>withdrawMoney()</l3> 方法。<x4/>展示了一个可以加到 <l5>BankAccountTest</l5> 测试用例类中来完全覆盖 <l6>BankAccount</l6> 类的测试。

The commands of Selenium 1 are implemented dynamically via __call. Refer also to <u0>the API docs for PHPUnit_Extensions_SeleniumTestCase_Driver::__call()</u0> for a list of all the supported methods on the PHP side, along with arguments and return type where available.
Selenium 1 命令是通过 __call 来动态实现的。请查看 <u0>PHPUnit_Extensions_SeleniumTestCase_Driver::__call() 的 API 文档</u0> 来获取所有 PHP 侧所支持的所有方法的列表以及它们的参数和返回类型。
The commands of Selenium2TestCase are implemented via __call(). Please refer to <u0>the end-to-end test for PHPUnit_Extensions_Selenium2TestCase</u0> for a list of every supported feature.
Selenium2TestCase 的命令是通过 __call() 来实现的。请参考 <u0>the end-to-end test for PHPUnit_Extensions_Selenium2TestCase</u0> 以获取所有受支持的特性的列表。

完整的 BankAccount 类

The default test name format is the equivalent of using the <l0>__METHOD__</l0> magic constant inside the test method.

The easiest way to obtain PHPUnit is to download a <u0>PHP Archive (PHAR)</u0> that has all required (as well as some optional) dependencies of PHPUnit bundled in a single file.
要获取 PHPUnit，最简单的方法是下载 PHPUnit 的 <u0>PHP 档案包 (PHAR)</u0>，它将 PHPUnit 所需要的所有必要组件（以及某些可选组件）捆绑在单个文件中：
The easiest way to obtain PHPUnit is to download a <u0>PHP Archive (PHAR)</u0> that has all required (as well as some optional) dependencies of PHPUnit bundled in a single file:
要获取 PHPUnit，最简单的方法是下载 PHPUnit 的 <u0>PHP Archive (PHAR)</u0>，它将 PHPUnit 所需要的所有必要组件（以及某些可选组件）捆绑在单个文件中：

The effort of implementing the <l0>assertTrue()</l0> and <l1>isTrue()</l1> methods as well as the <l2>PHPUnit_Framework_Constraint_IsTrue</l2> class yields the benefit that <l3>assertThat()</l3> automatically takes care of evaluating the assertion and bookkeeping tasks such as counting it for statistics. Furthermore, the <l4>isTrue()</l4> method can be used as a matcher when configuring mock objects.

在实现 <l0>assertTrue()</l0> 和 <l1>isTrue()</l1> 方法及 <l2>PHPUnit_Framework_Constraint_IsTrue</l2> 类时所付出的努力带来了一些好处，<l3>assertThat()</l3> 能够自动负责起断言的评定与任务簿记（例如为了统计目的而对其进行计数）工作。此外， <l4>isTrue()</l4> 方法还可以在配置仿件对象时用来作为匹配器。

下面这个例子中展示了测试用例类中所有可用的模板方法。

仅当原始类中不包含名字为“method”的方法时，以上范例才能正常运行。

The expected message can also be specified as a regular expression using the <l0>@expectedExceptionMessageRegExp</l0> annotation. This is helpful for situations where a substring is not adequate for matching a given message.
预期讯息也可以通过 <l0>@expectedExceptionMessageRegExp</l0> 标注以正则表达式来指定。当无法用子串来完成对给定讯息的匹配时，这种方式就非常有用了。
The expected message can also be specified as a regular expression. This is helpful for situations where a substring is not adequate for matching a given message.
预期讯息也可以以正则表达式来指定。当无法用子串来完成对给定讯息的匹配时，这种方式就非常有用了。

The expected message can be a substring of the exception Message. This can be useful to only assert that a certain name or parameter that was passed in shows up in the exception and not fixate the whole exception message in the test.
预期讯息可以是异常讯息的子串。在只需要断言传入的特定名称或参数确实出现于异常中时这个特性很有用，这样就无需在测试中关注完整的异常讯息。
The fifth (optional) parameter can be used to disable the call to the original class' constructor.
第五（可选）参数可用于禁用对原版类的构造方法的调用。
The file-based datasets and tables are generally used for the initial fixture and to describe the expected state of the database.
基于文件的数据集和表一般用于初始化基境或描述数据库的预期状态。

The fixes for <u0>#552</u0>, <u1>#573</u1>, and <u2>#582</u2> required a change to how relative paths are resolved for PHPUnit's XML configuration file. All relative paths in a configuration file are now resolved relative to that configuration file. When upgrading, you may need to update relative paths for the following configurations <c3>testSuiteLoaderFile</c3>, <c4>printerFile</c4>, <c5>testsuites/file</c5>, and <c6>testsuites/exclude</c6>.

为了修复 <u0>#552</u0>、<u1>#573</u1> 和 <u2>#582</u2>，必须更改 PHPUnit 的 XML 配置文件中对相对路径的解析方式。现在，某个配置文件中所有相对路径都是相对于此配置文件所在路径进行解析的。在升级后，可能需要更新以下配置指令中的相对路径：<c3>testSuiteLoaderFile</c3>、<c4>printerFile</c4>、<c5>testsuites/file</c5> 和 <c6>testsuites/exclude</c6>。

The flat xml dataset makes a crucial assumption now, defining that the attributes on the first defined row of a table define the columns of this table. In the previous example this would mean <q0>id</q0>, <q1>content</q1>, <q2>user</q2> and <q3>created</q3> are columns of the guestbook table. For the second row where <q4>user</q4> is not defined a NULL would be inserted into the database.
在这里，Flat XML DataSet 做了一个关键假设：一个表的列信息由此表第一行的属性定义决定。在上面这个例子里，这意味着 guestbook 有 <q0>id</q0>、<q1>content</q1>、<q2>user</q2> 和 <q3>created</q3> 这几个列。第二行中 <q4>user</q4> 列没有定义，因此将向数据库中插入 NULL 值。

The focus of <u0>Behaviour-Driven Development</u0> is "the language and interactions used in the process of software development. Behavior-driven developers use their native language in combination with the ubiquitous language of <u1>Domain-Driven Design</u1> to describe the purpose and benefit of their code. This allows the developers to focus on why the code should be created, rather than the technical details, and minimizes translation between the technical language in which the code is written and the domain language spoken by the" domain experts.

<u0>行为驱动开发(Behaviour-Driven Development)</u0>的焦点是软件开发过程中所使用的语言与交互。行为驱动的开发者使用他们的原生语言配合<u1>领域驱动设计(Domain-Driven Design)</u1>的普遍语言来描述代码的目的与收益。这使得开发者能够将精力集中于为什么需要创建这些代码，而不是技术细节，并且能最小化编写代码所使用的技术语言和领域专家所使用的领域语言之间的转换。

有以下可选组件包可用：
The format string may contain the following placeholders:
格式定义字符串中可以使用如下占位符：
The four stages of a database test
数据库测试的四个阶段
The fourth (optional) parameter can be used to specify a class name for the generated test double class.
第四（可选）参数用于指定生成的测试替身类的类名。

The goal of using automated tests is to make fewer mistakes. While your code will still not be perfect, even with excellent tests, you will likely see a dramatic reduction in defects once you start automating tests. Automated tests give you justified confidence in your code. You can use this confidence to take more daring leaps in design (Refactoring), get along with your teammates better (Cross-Team Tests), improve relations with your customers, and go home every night with proof that the system is better now than it was this morning because of your efforts.
使用自动化测试的目的是少犯错。虽然说就算有了极好的测试你的代码也仍然无法达到完美，但是一旦开始进行自动化测试，你很可能会发现缺陷显著减少了。自动化测试让你对自己的代码有充分的信心。这种信心将让你能够在设计上做出更大胆的跨越（重构）、同团队成员们合作地更好（跨团队测试）、与客户之间的关系有所改善，并且在每天晚上回家时都能确信，自己的努力使系统比当天早上更好。

The handling of NULL values with the flat xml dataset is tedious. A NULL value is different than an empty string value in almost any database (Oracle being an exception), something that is difficult to describe in the flat xml format. You can represent a NULL's value by omitting the attribute from the row specification. If our guestbook would allow anonymous entries represented by a NULL value in the user column, a hypothetical state of the guestbook table could look like:
在 Flat XML DataSet 中，要处理 NULL 值会非常烦。在几乎所有数据库中（Oracle 是个例外），NULL 值和空字符串值是有区别的，这一点在 Flat XML 格式中很难表述。可以在数据行的表述中省略掉对应的属性来表示NULL值。假定上面这个留言本通过在 user 列使用 NULL 值的方式来允许匿名留言，那么 guestbook 表的内容可能是这样：
The ignored lines of code (marked as ignored using the annotations) are counted as executed (if they are executable) and will not be highlighted.
代码中被忽略掉的行（用标注标记为忽略）将会计为已执行（如果它们是可执行的），并且不会在代码覆盖情况中被高亮标记。
The implementation for this Array DataSet is simple and straightforward:
这个数组 DataSet 类的实现是非常简单直接的：
The implementation of the backup and restore operations for global variables and static attributes of classes uses <l0>serialize()</l0> and <l1>unserialize()</l1>.
对全局变量和类的静态属性的备份与还原操作其实现方案使用了 <l0>serialize()</l0> 与 <l1>unserialize()</l1>。

The limited support for <u0>stubbing and mocking static methods</u0> that was introduced in PHPUnit 3.5 has been removed. This feature only worked when the stubbed or mocked static method was invoked from another method of the same class. We believe that the limited use of this feature did not justify the increased complexity in the test doubles code generator it incurred. We apologize for any inconvenience this removal may cause and encourage refactoring the code under test to not require this feature for testing.
在 PHPUnit 3.5 中引入的<u0>对静态方法进行上桩或模拟</u0>的有限支持已移除。此功能仅当被上桩或模拟的静态方法是从同一个类其他方法中调用时才能正常工作。我们认为，没有理由为了这个功能的这点有限的用途而在测试替身代码生成器中增加那么多代码复杂度。对这个移除动作我们表示很抱歉，有可能需要重构测试代码以使得不需要此功能来对其进行测试。
The method you want to test executes a rather large JOIN operation and uses the data to calculate some important results.
待测方法执行了一个相当大的 JOIN 操作，并且得到的数据用于计算某些重要的结果。

The most common dataset is called Flat XML. It is a very simple xml format where a tag inside the root node <l0><dataset></l0> represents exactly one row in the database. The tags name equals the table to insert the row into and an attribute represents the column. An example for a simple guestbook application could look like this:
最常见的一种数据集名叫 Flat XML。这是一种非常简单的 XML 格式，根节点为 <l0><dataset></l0>，根节点下的每个标签就代表数据库中的一行数据。标签的名称就等于表名，而每个属性代表一个列。一个简单的留言本应用程序的例子大致上可能是这样：

The only supported scenario of PHPUnit_Selenium is that of a Selenium 2.x server. The server can be accessed through the classic Selenium RC Api, already present in 1.x, or with the WebDriver API (partially implemented) from PHPUnit_Selenium 1.2.
PHPUnit_Selenium 只支持 Selenium 2.x 服务器的脚本。服务器可以通过从 1.x 就提供的传统 Selenium RC API 访问，也可以从 PHPUnit_Selenium 1.2 用 WebDriver API（部分实现）访问。
The order in which tests are executed can be made explicit:
可以明确指定测试的执行顺序：

The point of <u0>Test-Driven Development</u0> is to drive out the functionality the software actually needs, rather than what the programmer thinks it probably ought to have. The way it does this seems at first counterintuitive, if not downright silly, but it not only makes sense, it also quickly becomes a natural and elegant way to develop software.
<u0>测试驱动开发</u0>的要点是驱动出软件实际需要的功能，而不是程序员自认为软件应该有的功能。它实现这点的方式初看起来就算不是彻头彻尾的愚蠢也至少是有悖常理，但是它不仅是有道理的，还很快就成为一种自然而又优雅的软件开发方式。

The possibility to run the database tests against different database targets easily is very important if you are developing on the development machine. If several developers run the database tests against the same database connection you can easily experience test-failures because of race-conditions.
在开发机上进行开发时能够轻松的针对不同的目标数据库来运行数据库测试显得非常重要。如果多个开发人员在同一个数据库连接上运行数据库测试，很容易因为竞态而导致测试失败。

The practice of replacing an object with a test double that (optionally) returns configured return values is referred to as <e0>stubbing</e0>. You can use a <e1>stub</e1> to "replace a real component on which the SUT depends so that the test has a control point for the indirect inputs of the SUT. This allows the test to force the SUT down paths it might not otherwise execute".
将对象替换为（可选地）返回配置好的返回值的测试替身的实践方法称为<e0>上桩(stubbing)</e0>。可以用<e1>桩件(stub)</e1>来“替换掉被测系统所依赖的实际组件，这样测试就有了对被测系统的间接输入的控制点。这使得测试能强制安排被测系统的执行路径，否则被测系统可能无法执行”。
The practice of replacing an object with a test double that verifies expectations, for instance asserting that a method has been called, is referred to as <e0>mocking</e0>.
将对象替换为能验证预期行为（例如断言某个方法必会被调用）的测试替身的实践方法称为<e0>模仿(mocking)</e0>。

The previous assertion is helpful, but we surely want to check the actual contents of the table to verify that all the values were written into the correct columns. This can be achieved by a table assertion.
前面的这个断言很有帮助，但是肯定还想要检验表的实际内容，好核实是否所有值都写到了正确的列中。可以通过表断言来做到这一点。

The public interface is used internally by the <l0>assertDataSetsEqual()</l0> assertion on the Database TestCase to check for dataset quality. From the <l1>IteratorAggregate</l1> interface the IDataSet inherits the <l2>getIterator()</l2> method to iterate over all tables of the dataset. The reverse iterator allows PHPUnit to truncate tables opposite the order they were created to satisfy foreign key constraints.

这些 public 接口在数据库 TestCase 中 <l0>assertDataSetsEqual()</l0> 断言内使用，用以检测数据集是否相等。IDataSet 中继承自 <l1>IteratorAggregate</l1> 接口的 <l2>getIterator()</l2> 方法用于对数据集中的所有表进行迭代。逆序迭代器让 PHPUnit 能够按照与创建时相反的顺序对所有表执行 TRUNCATE 操作，以此来保证满足外键约束。
The reason behind this decision is that Selenium 2 is backward compatible and Selenium RC is not maintained anymore.
这个决定的原因是 Selenium 2 是向后兼容的，而 Selenium RC 已经不再维护了。

The return value yielded by a producer is passed "as-is" to its consumers by default. This means that when a producer returns an object a reference to that object is passed to the consumers. When a copy should be used instead of a reference then <c0>@depends clone</c0> should be used instead of <c1>@depends</c1>.
默认情况下，生产者所产生的返回值将“原样”传递给相应的消费者。这意味着，如果生产者返回的是一个对象，那么传递给消费者的将是一个指向此对象的引用。如果需要传递对象的副本而非引用，则应当用 <c0>@depends clone</c0> 替代 <c1>@depends</c1>。

The same applies to static properties of classes that were newly loaded/declared within a test. They cannot be reset to their originally declared default value after the test, since that value is unknown. Whichever value is set will leak into subsequent tests.
同样的情况也发生于测试内部新加载/声明的类的静态属性上。它们也无法在测试结束之后复原为声明时提供的原始默认值，因为无从得知这些默认值。这些被修改过的值会泄漏到后继测试中。
The score for a frame is the total number of pins knocked down, plus bonuses for strikes and spares.
每轮的得分是击倒的球瓶总数加上全中(strike)和补中(spare)带来的奖励。
The section <q0>Using the Database Connection</q0> explains the API of this interface and how you can make the best use of it.
<q0>使用数据库连接</q0>一节解说了这个接口的API以及如何充分利用它们。
The section on Database Assertions will show some more details on how to make use of the Query DataSet.
在关于数据库断言的那一节中有更多关于如何使用 Query DataSet 的细节。
The seventh (optional) parameter can be used to disable <l0>__autoload()</l0> during the generation of the test double class.
第七（可选）参数可用于在测试替身类的生成期间禁用 <l0>__autoload()</l0>。
The sixth (optional) parameter can be used to disable the call to the original class' clone constructor.
第六（可选）参数可用于禁用对原版类的克隆构造方法的调用。

The standard test suite loader will look for the sourcefile in the current working directory and in each directory that is specified in PHP's <l0>include_path</l0> configuration directive. A class name such as <l1>Project_Package_Class</l1> is mapped to the source filename <f2>Project/Package/Class.php</f2>.
标准的测试套件加载器将在当前工作目录和 PHP 的 <l0>include_path</l0> 配置指令中指定的每个目录内查找源文件。诸如 <l1>Project_Package_Class</l1> 这样的类名对应的源文件名为 <f2>Project/Package/Class.php</f2>。
The table name
表的名称
The test for the first contract condition now passes, but the tests for the second contract condition fail because we have yet to implement the methods that these tests call.
针对第一个契约条件的测试现在能够通过了，不过第二个契约条件的测试依然失败，因为尚未实现其所调用的方法。
The test is now completely automated. Instead of just <e0>testing</e0> as we did with our first version, with this version we have an <e1>automated test</e1>.
现在测试完全自动化了。在第一个版本里我们只是简单的<e0>测试</e0>，而这个版本已经是<e1>自动测试</e1>。
The test itself is more concise.
测试本身更加简洁。
The test name for a PHPT test is the filesystem path.
对于 PHPT 测试，其测试名称是文件系统路径。
The test names to match will be in one of the following formats:
测试名称将以以下格式之一进行匹配：
The tests are public methods that are named <l0>test*</l0>.
测试都是命名为 <l0>test*</l0> 的公用方法。
The tests for a class <l0>Class</l0> go into a class <l1>ClassTest</l1>.
针对类 <l0>Class</l0> 的测试写在类 <l1>ClassTest</l1>中。
The tests should not affect each other. If the order in which the tests are run changes, the results of the tests should not change.
不同测试之间应当互不影响。改变测试的运行顺序应当不影响测试的结果。
The tests should run at the touch of a button and present their results in a clear and unambiguous format.
测试应当只要点一个按钮就能运行，并且以清晰明确的格式呈现结果。
The tests that ensure the second contract condition now pass, too:
用来确保第二个契约条件的测试现在也能够通过了：
The third (optional) parameter may hold a parameter array that is passed to the original class' constructor (which is not replaced with a dummy implementation by default).
第三（可选）参数持有的是传递给原版类的构造函数（默认情况下不会被替换为伪实现）的参数数组。

The upgrade should be rather easy and work without any issues as it was tested against all major Open Source frameworks and there was not a single problem for them. Still every project is different and if you did not get around to trying one of the release candidates and have ran into an issue this document might provide some help.
升级应当是十分简单且不会遭遇任何问题的，因为这个过程已经针对所有主要的开源框架进行过测试并且不存在任何问题。但是每个项目毕竟是各有不同的，如果你已经尝试了某个候选发布版本并且遭遇到了问题，本文档也许能提供一些帮助。
There are few good reasons to share fixtures between tests, but in most cases the need to share a fixture between tests stems from an unresolved design problem.
有几个好的理由来在测试之间共享基境，但是大部分情况下，在测试之间共享基境的需求都源于某个未解决的设计问题。
There are several means to achieve this pre-condition to database testing.
有几种方法来达成这个数据库测试的先决条件。

本选项有三个可能的值：

There is another more structured XML dataset, which is a bit more verbose to write but avoids the NULL problems of the Flat XML dataset. Inside the root node <l0><dataset></l0> you can specify <l1><table></l1>, <l2><column></l2>, <l3><row></l3>, <l4><value></l4> and <l5><null /></l5> tags. An equivalent dataset to the previously defined Guestbook Flat XML looks like:

有另外一种更加结构化的 XML DataSet，它写起来有点冗长，但是规避了 Flat XML DataSet 所存在的 NULL 问题。在根节点 <l0><dataset></l0> 内，可以指定 <l1><table></l1>、<l2><column></l2>、 <l3><row></l3>、<l4><value></l4> 和 <l5><null /></l5> 标签。和上面用 Flat XML 所定义的留言本数据集等价的 XML DataSet 如下：
There is no Array based DataSet in PHPUnit's Database Extension (yet), but we can implement our own easily. Our guestbook example should look like:
在 PHPUnit 的数据库扩展中，（尚）没有基于数组的 DataSet，不过很容易自行实现之。留言本的例子大致是这样：

This abstraction is necessary to compare the actual contents of a database against the expected contents. Expectations can be represented as XML, YAML, CSV files or PHP array for example. The DataSet and DataTable interfaces enable the comparison of these conceptually different sources, emulating relational database storage in a semantically similar approach.
为了能比较实际内容和预期内容，这种抽象是必须的。预期内容可以用诸如 XML、 YAML、 CSV 文件或者 PHP 数组等方式来表达。DataSet 和 DataTable 接口以语义相似的方式模拟关系数据库存储，从而能够对这些概念上完全不同的数据源进行比较。
This annotation is especially useful in strict coverage mode where unintentionally covered code will cause a test to fail. See <x0/> for more information regarding strict coverage mode.
在严格覆盖模式中，意外覆盖的代码将导致测试判定为失败，这个标注就显得特别有用。关于严格覆盖模式的更多信息，参见<x0/>。
This appendix lists the various assertion methods that are available.
本附录列举可用的各种断言方法。

To allow the clean-up and fixture loading functionalities to work the PHPUnit Database Extension requires access to a database connection abstracted across vendors through the PDO library. It is important to note that your application does not need to be based on PDO to use PHPUnit's database extension, the connection is merely used for the clean-up and fixture setup.
为了让清理与载入基境的功能正常运作，PHPUnit 数据库扩展模块需要用 PDO 库来实现跨供应商抽象访问数据库连接。重要的是要注意到，使用 PHPUnit 的数据库扩展模块并不要求应用程序本身基于PDO，PDO连接仅仅用于清理和建立基境。

To use the Flat XML dataset effectively when NULL values are relevant the first row of each table must not contain any NULL value and only successive rows are allowed to omit attributes. This can be awkward, since the order of the rows is a relevant factor for database assertions.
要在有 NULL 值的情况下有效地使用 Flat XML Dataset，就必须保证每个表的第一行不包含 NULL 值，只有后继的那些行才能省略属性。这就有点棘手，因为数据行的排列顺序也是数据断言的一个相关因素。

Typically, in a project that is developed using an agile process, such as Extreme Programming, the documentation cannot keep up with the frequent changes to the project's design and code. Extreme Programming demands <e0>collective code ownership</e0>, so all developers need to know how the entire system works. If you are disciplined enough to consequently use "speaking names" for your tests that describe what a class should do, you can use PHPUnit's TestDox functionality to generate automated documentation for your project based on its tests. This documentation gives developers an overview of what each class of the project is supposed to do.

通常，在使用了诸如极限编程之类的敏捷流程的项目中，文档往往无法跟上项目设计与代码的频繁变更。极限编程要求<e0>群体代码所有权(collective code ownership)</e0>，因此所有开发者都需要知道整个系统是如何工作的。如果你足够训练有素，为测试使用了“能说明问题的名称(speaking names)”来描述各个类应当干什么，那么就可以用 PHPUnit 的 TestDox 功能来基于项目的测试生成项目的自动文档。这个文档能够就项目中的各个类应当起什么作用给开发者一份概述。

理解 DataSet（数据集）和 DataTable（数据表）
Unintentionally Covered Code
意外的代码覆盖
Unit Test
Unit Test （单元测试）

Unit Tests are a vital part of several software development practices and processes such as Test-First Programming, <u0>Extreme Programming</u0>, and <u1>Test-Driven Development</u1>. They also allow for <u2>Design-by-Contract</u2> in programming languages that do not support this methodology with language constructs.

单元测试是一些软件开发实践与流程的至关重要的组成部分，比如测试优先编程(Test-First Programming)、<u0>极限编程(Extreme Programming)</u0>、<u1>测试驱动开发(Test-Driven Development)</u1>。它们还使得将<u2>契约式设计(Design-by-Contract)</u2>应用到语言结构上未支持这套方法的编程语言中成为可能。

Unit Tests are primarily written as a good practice to help developers identify and fix bugs, to refactor code and to serve as documentation for a unit of software under test. To achieve these benefits, unit tests ideally should cover all the possible paths in a program. One unit test usually covers one specific path in one function or method. However a test method is not necessary an encapsulated, independent entity. Often there are implicit dependencies between test methods, hidden in the implementation scenario of a test.
单元测试主要是作为一种良好实践来编写的，它能帮助开发人员识别并修复 bug、重构代码，还可以看作被测软件单元的文档。要实现这些好处，理想的单元测试应当覆盖程序中所有可能的路径。一个单元测试通常覆盖一个函数或方法中的一个特定路径。但是，测试方法并不一定非要是一个封装良好的独立实体。测试方法之间经常有隐含的依赖关系暗藏在测试的实现方案中。
Unit testing offers many advantages:
进行单元测试带来了很多好处：
Unit tests provide working examples for how to use an API and can significantly aid documentation efforts.
单元测试就如何使用 API 提供了可正常工作的范例，能够大大帮助文档编制工作。

Using the <l0>runSelenese($filename)</l0> method, you can also run a Selenium test from its Selenese/HTML specification. Furthermore, using the static attribute <l1>$seleneseDirectory</l1>, you can automatically create test objects from a directory that contains Selenese/HTML files. The specified directory is recursively searched for <l2>.htm</l2> files that are expected to contain Selenese/HTML. <x3/> shows an example.

通过使用 <l0>runSelenese($filename)</l0> 方法，可以从 Selenese/HTML 规格来运行 Selenium 测试。此外，通过使用静态属性 <l1>$seleneseDirectory</l1>，可以从包含 Selenese/HTML 文件的目录里自动创建测试对象。PHPUnit 会在指定的目录中的递归查找 <l2>.htm</l2> 文件，并预期这些文件内含 Selenese/HTML。<x3/> 展示了例子。

We don't have the release manager's public key (<l0>6372C20A</l0>) in our local system. In order to proceed with the verification we need to retrieve the release manager's public key from a key server. One such server is <f1>pgp.uni-mainz.de</f1>. The public key servers are linked together, so you should be able to connect to any key server.
在本地系统中没有发行包管理器的公钥(<l0>6372C20A</l0>)。为了能进行校验，必须从某个密钥服务器上取得发行包管理器的公钥。其中一个服务器是 <f1>pgp.uni-mainz.de</f1>。所有密钥服务器是链接在一起的，因此连接到任一密钥服务器都可以。

We first use the <l0>getMock()</l0> method that is provided by the <l1>PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase</l1> class to set up a mock object for the <l2>Observer</l2>. Since we give an array as the second (optional) parameter for the <l3>getMock()</l3> method, only the <l4>update()</l4> method of the <l5>Observer</l5> class is replaced by a mock implementation.
首先用 <l1>PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase</l1> 类提供的 <l0>getMock()</l0> 方法建立 <l2>Observer</l2> 的仿件对象。由于给出了一个数组做为 <l3>getMock()</l3> 方法的第二（可选）参数，<l5>Observer</l5> 类只有 <l4>update()</l4> 方法会被替换为仿实现。
