We now factor out the comparison of expected and actual values into a function that raises an Exception when there is a discrepancy (<x0/>). This gives us two benefits: the writing of tests becomes easier and we only get output when something is wrong.
现在我们把对预期值和实际值进行比较的部分提取出来，成为独立的函数，在二个值存在差异时这个函数会抛出异常（<x0/>）。这有两个好处：编写测试更容易了，并且只在出错时产生输出。

We now write the minimal amount of code needed for the first test, <l0>testBalanceIsInitiallyZero()</l0>, to pass. In our example this amounts to implementing the <l1>getBalance()</l1> method of the <l2>BankAccount</l2> class, as shown in <x3/>.
现在编写最少量的代码来让第一个测试 <l0>testBalanceIsInitiallyZero()</l0>能够通过。在这个例子里，这个实现 <l2>BankAccount</l2> 类的 <l1>getBalance()</l1> 方法的代码量如<x3/>中所示。
We should be able to run any number or combination of tests together. This is a corollary of isolation.
应当能将任意数量的测试以任意组合方式运行。这是相互独立的必然结果。
We then wrap the Flat XML DataSet into a Replacement DataSet:
然后将 Flat XML DataSet 包装在 Replacement DataSet 中：
We want to verify PHPUnit's PHP Archive (<f0>phpunit.phar</f0>) against its detached signature (<f1>phpunit.phar.asc</f1>):
用单独的签名(<f0>phpunit.phar</f0>)对 PHPUnit 的 PHP 档案包(<f1>phpunit.phar.asc</f1>)进行校验：

We write the tests for the <l0>BankAccount</l0> class before we write the code for the class itself. We use the contract conditions as the basis for the tests and name the test methods accordingly, as shown in <x1/>.
在编写 <l0>BankAccount</l0> 类的实际代码之前先来编写针对它的测试。以合约条件作为测试的基础，并据此的命名测试方法，如<x1/>中所示。

What PHPUnit cannot help you with is the fact that database tests are very slow compared to tests not using the database. Depending on how large the interactions with your database are your tests could run a considerable amount of time. However if you keep the amount of data used for each test small and try to test as much code using non-database tests you can easily get away in under a minute even for large test suites.
PHPUnit 无法帮你解决的问题是，相对于不使用数据的测试而言，数据库测试是非常慢的。随着数据库交互规模的增大，运行测试可能需要耗费可观的时间。然而，只要保持每个测试所使用的数据量较小并且尽可能用非数据库测试来对代码进行测试，即使很大的测试套件也能轻松在一分钟内跑完。

What PHPUnit cannot help you with is the fact that database tests are very slow compared to tests not using the database. Depending on how large the interactions with your database are your tests could run a considerable amount of time. However, if you keep the amount of data used for each test small and try to test as much code using non-database tests you can easily get away in under a minute even for large test suites.
PHPUnit 无法帮你解决的问题是，相对于不使用数据的测试而言，数据库测试是非常慢的。随着数据库交互规模的增大，运行测试可能需要耗费可观的时间。然而，只要保持每个测试所使用的数据量较小并且尽可能用非数据库测试来对代码进行测试，即使很大的测试套件也能轻松在一分钟内跑完。
What about the Database Schema (DDL)?
数据库构架(DDL)怎么办？
What can I do, when I get a <q0>Too much Connections</q0> Error?
如果看到 <q0>Too much Connections</q0> 错误该怎么办？

What follows is necessarily an abbreviated introduction to Test-Driven Development. You can explore the topic further in other books, such as <e0>Test-Driven Development</e0> <x1/> by Kent Beck or Dave Astels' <e2>A Practical Guide to Test-Driven Development</e2> <x3/>.
接下来应当是对测试驱动开发的简短介绍。可以在其他书里深入探索这个主题，例如 Kent Beck 写的<e0>《测试驱动开发(Test-Driven Development)》</e0> <x1/>，或者 Dave Astels 写的<e2>《测试驱动开发实践指南(A Practical Guide to Test-Driven Development)》</e2> <x3/>。
What happens when you have two tests with slightly different setups? There are two possibilities:
如果两个基境建立工作略有不同的测试该怎么办？有两种可能：
What is a Fixture?
什么是基境(fixture)？
When <l0>--colors</l0> is used without any value, <l1>auto</l1> is the chosen value.
当使用了 <l0>--colors</l0> 选项但未指定任何值时，将选择 <l1>auto</l1> 做为其值。
When a comparison fails PHPUnit creates textual representations of the input values and compares those. Due to that implementation a diff might show more problems than actually exist.
当比较失败时，PHPUnit 为输入值建立文本表示，然后以此进行对比。这种实现导致在差异指示中显示出来的问题可能比实际上存在的多。

When a test depends on a test that uses data providers, the depending test will be executed when the test it depends upon is successful for at least one data set. The result of a test that uses data providers cannot be injected into a depending test.
如果一个测试依赖于另外一个使用了数据供给器的测试，仅当被依赖的测试至少能在一组数据上成功时，依赖于它的测试才会运行。使用了数据供给器的测试，其运行结果是无法注入到依赖于此测试的其他测试中的。
When a test has a data provider that uses named sets, each iteration of the data gets the current name appended to the end of the default test name. See <x0/> for an example of named data sets.
当测试拥有使用命名数据集的数据供给器时，数据的每轮迭代都会将当前名称附加在默认测试名称结尾处。命名数据集的例子参见<x0/>。
When a test has a data provider, each iteration of the data gets the current index appended to the end of the default test name.
当测试拥有数据供给器时，数据的每轮迭代都会将其当前索引附加在默认测试名称结尾处。

When a test is run in a separate process, PHPUnit will attempt to preserve the global state from the parent process by serializing all globals in the parent process and unserializing them in the child process. This can cause problems if the parent process contains globals that are not serializable. To fix this, you can prevent PHPUnit from preserving global state with the <l0>@preserveGlobalState</l0> annotation.
在单独的进程中运行测试时，PHPUnit 会尝试保持来自父进程的全局状态（通过在父进程序列化全局状态然后在子进程反序列化的方式）。这当父进程包含非可序列化的全局内容时可能会导致问题。为了修正这种问题，可以用 <l0>@preserveGlobalState</l0> 标注来禁止 PHPUnit 保持全局状态。

When a test receives input from both a <l0>@dataProvider</l0> method and from one or more tests it <l1>@depends</l1> on, the arguments from the data provider will come before the ones from depended-upon tests. The arguments from depended-upon tests will be the same for each data set. See
如果测试同时从 <l0>@dataProvider</l0> 方法和一个或多个 <l1>@depends</l1> 测试接收数据，那么来自于数据供给器的参数将先于来自所依赖的测试的。来自于所依赖的测试的参数对于每个数据集都是一样的。参见

When generating code coverage and using <l0><whitelist addUncoveredFilesFromWhitelist="true"></l0> all uncovered files got included by PHPUnit. This was an issue for people with executable code in those files. PHPUnit will now scan the file and guess what code is executable and what code is not without including it. This might lead to different code coverage reports.

在生成代码覆盖率时，如果使用了 <l0><whitelist addUncoveredFilesFromWhitelist="true"></l0>，PHPUnit 将会对所有无覆盖的文件进行包含(include)操作。对于这些文件中包含可执行代码的人而言这会是个问题。PHPUnit 现在将扫描文件并在不执行包含操作的情况下尝试猜测确定哪些代码是可执行的哪些代码是不可执行的。这有可能导致代码覆盖率报告有所不同。

When invoked as shown above, the PHPUnit command-line test runner will look for a <f0>ArrayTest.php</f0> sourcefile in the current working directory, load it, and expect to find a <l1>ArrayTest</l1> test case class. It will then execute the tests of that class.
上面这个调用例子中，PHPUnit 命令行测试执行器将在当前工作目录中寻找 <f0>ArrayTest.php</f0> 源文件并加载之。而在此源文件中应当能找到 <l1>ArrayTest</l1> 测试用例类，此类中的测试将被执行。
When set to <l0>false</l0>, the error handler installed by <l1>convertErrorsToExceptions</l1> will not convert <l2>E_NOTICE</l2>, <l3>E_USER_NOTICE</l3>, or <l4>E_STRICT</l4> errors to exceptions.
此选项设置为 <l0>false</l0> 时，由 <l1>convertErrorsToExceptions</l1> 安插的错误处理函数不会将 <l2>E_NOTICE</l2>、<l3>E_USER_NOTICE</l3>、<l4>E_STRICT</l4> 错误转换为异常。
When set to <l0>false</l0>, the error handler installed by <l1>convertErrorsToExceptions</l1> will not convert <l2>E_WARNING</l2> or <l3>E_USER_WARNING</l3> errors to exceptions.
此选项设置为 <l0>false</l0> 时，由 <l1>convertErrorsToExceptions</l1> 安插的错误处理函数不会将 <l2>E_WARNING</l2> 或 <l3>E_USER_WARNING</l3> 错误转换为异常。
When testing a fluent interface, it is sometimes useful to have a stubbed method return a reference to the stubbed object. <x0/> shows how you can use <l1>returnSelf()</l1> to achieve this.
在用流畅式接口进行测试时，让某个已上桩的方法返回对桩件对象的引用有时会很有用。<x0/>展示了如何用 <l1>returnSelf()</l1> 来做到这点。

When testing that relies on php functions that trigger errors like <l0>fopen</l0> it can sometimes be useful to use error suppression while testing. This allows you to check the return values by suppressing notices that would lead to a phpunit <l1>PHPUnit_Framework_Error_Notice</l1>.
如果测试依靠会触发错误的 PHP 函数，例如 <l0>fopen</l0> ，有时候在测试中使用错误抑制符会很有用。通过抑制住错误通知，就能对返回值进行检查，否则错误通知将会导致抛出 <l1>PHPUnit_Framework_Error_Notice</l1>。
When the first guestbook entry is deleted from the dataset only <q0>id</q0>, <q1>content</q1> and <q2>created</q2> would be columns of the guestbook table, since <q3>user</q3> is not specified.
如果从数据集中删掉第一行，因为没有指定 <q3>user</q3>，guestbook 表拥有的列就只剩下 <q0>id</q0>、<q1>content</q1> 和 <q2>created</q2>。
When the generated output would be long to read PHPUnit will split it up and provide a few lines of context around every difference.
当生成的输出很长而难以阅读时，PHPUnit 将对其进行分割，并在每个差异附近提供少数几行上下文信息。

When the second (optional) parameter is provided, only the methods whose names are in the array are replaced with a configurable test double. The behavior of the other methods is not changed. Providing <l0>NULL</l0> as the parameter means that no methods will be replaced.
如果提供了第二个（可选）参数，那么只有名称在数组中的方法会被替换为可配置的测试替身。其他方法的行为不会有所改变。如果以 <l0>NULL</l0> 作为（第二）参数，意味着不会有方法被替换。

When the stubbed method call should return a calculated value instead of a fixed one (see <l0>returnValue()</l0>) or an (unchanged) argument (see <l1>returnArgument()</l1>), you can use <l2>returnCallback()</l2> to have the stubbed method return the result of a callback function or method. See <x3/> for an example.
如果上桩的方法需要返回计算得到的值而不是固定值（参见 <l0>returnValue()</l0>）或某个（未改变的）参数（参见 <l1>returnArgument()</l1>），可以用 <l2>returnCallback()</l2> 来让上桩的方法返回回调函数或方法的结果。范例参见<x3/>。
When the test execution terminates before the <l0>tearDown()</l0> method is invoked the directory will stay in the filesystem.
如果测试在 <l0>tearDown()</l0> 方法被调用之前就终止了，这个目录就会遗留在文件系统中。
When using a large number of datasets it's useful to name each one with string key instead of default numeric. Output will be more verbose as it'll contain that name of a dataset that breaks a test.
当使用到大量数据集时，最好逐个用字符串键名对其命名，避免用默认的数字键名。这样输出信息会更加详细些，其中将包含打断测试的数据集所对应的名称。

When using custom test listeners as described in <x0/> PHPUnit silently ignored missing test listeners and it was quite hard to debug that issues for the user. Now one autoload call will be triggered trying to locate the class. If your autoloader produces an error when it doesn't find a test listener you might run into an issue here. Removing the listener or making sure it's loaded in your <l1>bootstrap.php</l1> will solve this.
当像<x0/>中描述的那样使用自定义测试监听器时，PHPUnit 静默地忽略掉缺失的测试监听器。对于用户来说，这方面的问题极其难于调试。现在，在尝试定位这些类时会触发一次对自动加载(autoload)的调用。如果你所使用的自动加载器在找不到测试监听器时生成一个错误，就可能让你在这里碰到问题。要这个问题，移除这个监听器或者在 <l1>bootstrap.php</l1> 中确保这个类已被加载。

When we are writing a test in which we cannot (or chose not to) use a real depended-on component (DOC), we can replace it with a Test Double. The Test Double doesn't have to behave exactly like the real DOC; it merely has to provide the same API as the real one so that the SUT thinks it is the real one!
如果在编写测试时无法使用（或选择不使用）实际的依赖组件(DOC)，可以用测试替身来代替。测试替身不需要和真正的依赖组件有完全一样的的行为方式；他只需要提供和真正的组件同样的 API 即可，这样被测系统就会以为它是真正的组件！

When writing custom assertions it is the best practice to follow how PHPUnit's own assertions are implemented. As you can see in <x0/>, the <l1>assertTrue()</l1> method is just a wrapper around the <l2>isTrue()</l2> and <l3>assertThat()</l3> methods: <l4>isTrue()</l4> creates a matcher object that is passed on to <l5>assertThat()</l5> for evaluation.
编写自定义断言时，最佳实践是遵循 PHPUnit 自有断言的实现方式。正如 <x0/>中所示，<l1>assertTrue()</l1> 方法只是对 <l2>isTrue()</l2> 和 <l3>assertThat()</l3> 方法的外包覆：<l4>isTrue()</l4> 创建了一个匹配器对象，将其传递给 <l5>assertThat()</l5> 进行评定。

When you agree on coordinating your activities with the supplier of a package, you can write the tests together. Do this in such a way that the tests reveal as many assumptions as possible. Hidden assumptions are the death of cooperation. With the tests, you document exactly what you expect from the supplied package. The supplier will know the package is complete when all the tests run.
当你愿意和包的提供着协调你的活动时，你们可以共同编写测试。通过这样的方式，测试能够展现出尽可能多的假设。隐藏的假设是在给合作判死刑。利用测试，你精确的将对所提供的包的预期文档化。提供者在所有测试顺利运行时就知道包已经完整了。
When you are doing Test-Driven Development (see <x0/>) and write your tests before the code that the tests exercise, PHPUnit can help you generate class skeletons from test case classes.
在进行测试驱动开发（参见<x0/>）并在编写代码之前先编写其测试时，PHPUnit 能够帮你从测试用例类生成类的骨架。

When you are using the skeleton generator to generate code based on a class that is declared in a <u0>namespace</u0> you have to provide the qualified name of the class as well as the path to the source file it is declared in.
如果打算用骨架生成器来为声明在<u0>命名空间</u0>中的类生成代码，必须提供和其所在的源文件路径一致的类限定名称。
When you are working on a new test case class, you might want to begin by writing empty test methods such as:
开始写新的测试用例类时，可能想从写下空测试方法开始，比如：
When you are writing tests for existing code, you have to write the same code fragments such as
为已存在的代码编写测试时，不得不反复写下类似这样的代码片段：

When you document assumptions with tests, you own the tests. The supplier of the package -- who you make assumptions about -- knows nothing about your tests. If you want to have a closer relationship with the supplier of a package, you can use the tests to communicate and coordinate your activities.
一旦用测试将假设文档化，你就拥有了测试。包的提供者——你做假设的对象——对你的测试一无所知。如果打算与包的提供者有更亲密的关系，可以用测试来沟通与协调你的活动。

When you first write the test it cannot possibly run, because you are calling on objects and methods that have not been programmed yet. This might feel strange at first, but after a while you will get used to it. Think of Test-First Programming as a pragmatic approach to following the object-oriented programming principle of programming to an interface instead of programming to an implementation: while you are writing the test you are thinking about the interface of the object you are testing -- what does this object look like from the outside. When you go to make the test really work, you are thinking about pure implementation. The interface is fixed by the failing test.
如果首先编写测试，它是无法运行的，因为调用了尚未进行编程的类和方法。在一开始可能会觉得这很诡异，但是很快就会习惯。请将测试优先编程视为一种务实的实践方法，它遵从对接口编程而不是对实现编程的面向对象编程原则：当你编写测试时，你正是在考虑被测对象的接口——这个对象从外部看是什么样的。当考虑如何能让测试真正运作起来是，你所考虑的则是纯粹的实现。那些失败的测试已经确定了接口。

When you get a defect report, your impulse might be to fix the defect as quickly as possible. Experience shows that this impulse will not serve you well; it is likely that the fix for the defect causes another defect.
当看到缺陷报告时，你可能会有尽快修复错误的冲动。经验表明，这种冲动不是好事，因为修复一个缺陷时很可能导致另外一个缺陷。
When you need to add new functionality to the system, write the tests first. Then, you will be done developing when the test runs. This practice will be discussed in detail in the next chapter.
当需要向系统内添加新的功能时，首先为其编写测试。然后，当测试能够正常运行就标志着开发完成了。下一章将详细讨论这种做法。

When you need to make a change to the internal structure of the software you are working on to make it easier to understand and cheaper to modify without changing its observable behavior, a test suite is invaluable in applying these so called <u0>refactorings</u0> safely. Otherwise, you might not notice the system breaking while you are carrying out the restructuring.
当需要对软件的内部结构进行更改时，你实际上是要在不影响其可见行为的情况下让它更加容易理解、更加易于修改，测试套件对于安全地进行这些所谓的<u0>重构</u0>而言是非常宝贵的。否则，你可能在重组过程中将系统搞坏而不自知。

When you realize that it's all about specifying behaviour and not writing tests, your point of view shifts. Suddenly the idea of having a Test class for each of your production classes is ridiculously limiting. And the thought of testing each of your methods with its own test method (in a 1-1 relationship) will be laughable.
当你认识到它完全是关于指定行为而非编写测试时，你的观点就提升了。突然间，为每个生产类编写对应的测试类的想法就变成一种可笑的限制。同时，每个方法都用对应的测试方法（以一一对应关系）来测试的想法也一样变得很可笑。

When you set <l0>processUncoveredFilesFromWhitelist="true"</l0> in your PHPUnit configuration (see <x1/>) then these files will be included by PHP_CodeCoverage to properly calculate the number of executable lines.
如果在 PHPUnit 配置信息（参见<x1/>）中设置 <l0>processUncoveredFilesFromWhitelist="true"</l0>，那么所有这些文件将会由 PHP_CodeCoverage 进行包含，并正确计算其可执行行数。

When you test an object with PHPUnit, you do so only through the object's public interface. Testing based only on publicly visible behaviour encourages you to confront and solve difficult design problems earlier, before the results of poor design can infect large parts of the system.
使用 PHPUnit 测试一个对象时，只能利用对象的公共接口。只基于公共可见行为进行测试，有助于让你差劲的设计造成的后果在系统中广为蔓延之前就尽早面对并解决困难的设计问题。

When your application interacts with a web service you want to test it without actually interacting with the web service. To make the stubbing and mocking of web services easy, the <l0>getMockFromWsdl()</l0> can be used just like <l1>getMock()</l1> (see above). The only difference is that <l2>getMockFromWsdl()</l2> returns a stub or mock based on a web service description in WSDL and <l3>getMock()</l3> returns a stub or mock based on a PHP class or interface.

当应用程序需要和 web 服务进行交互时，会想要在不与 web 服务进行实际交互的情况下对其进行测试。为了简单地对 web 服务进行上桩或模仿，可以像使用 <l1>getMock()</l1> （见上文）那样使用 <l0>getMockFromWsdl()</l0>。唯一的区别是 <l2>getMockFromWsdl()</l2> 所返回的桩件或者仿件是基于以 WSDL 描述的 web 服务，而 <l3>getMock()</l3> 返回的桩件或者仿件是基于 PHP 类或接口的。
Whenever a test fails PHPUnit tries its best to provide you with as much context as possible that can help to identify the problem.
当有测试失败时，PHPUnit 全力提供尽可能多的有助于找出问题所在的上下文信息。
Whenever you are tempted to type something into a <l0>print</l0> statement or a debugger expression, write it as a test instead.
当你想把一些东西写到 <l0>print</l0> 语句或者调试表达式中时，别这么做，将其写成一个测试来代替。

While this is very convenient for editing with Excel or OpenOffice, you cannot specify NULL values with the CSV dataset. An empty column will lead to the database default empty value being inserted into the column.
用 Excel 或者 OpenOffice 来对这种格式进行编辑是非常方便的，但是在 CSV DataSet 中无法指定 NULL 值。给出一个空白列的结果是往这个列中插入数据库的默认空值。
Whitelist
Whitelist （白名单）
Whitelisting Files
将文件列入白名单
Whitelisting Files for Code Coverage
Whitelisting Files for Code Coverage
Wikipedia
Wikipedia
Will PHPUnit (re-)create the database schema for each test?
PHPUnit 会为每个测试（重新）创建数据库吗？
Windows
Windows
Without a virtual filesystem such as vfsStream we cannot test the <l0>setDirectory()</l0> method in isolation from external influence (see <x1/>).
如果不使用诸如 vfsStream 这样的虚拟文件系统，就无法在隔离外部影响的情况下对 <l0>setDirectory()</l0> 方法进行测试（参见 <x1/>）。
Without the error suppression the test would fail reporting <l0>fopen(/is-not-writeable/file): failed to open stream: No such file or directory</l0>.
如果不使用错误抑制符，此测试将会失败，并报告 <l0>fopen(/is-not-writeable/file): failed to open stream: No such file or directory</l0>。
Write all the rows in the data-tables into the database.
将数据集内数据表中的所有行写入数据库。
Write an automated test that fails now but will succeed when the defect is fixed.
编写一个目前会失败而缺陷修复后将会成功的自动测试。
Write custom assertions
编写自定义断言

Write custom assertions and utility methods in an abstract subclass of <l0>PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase</l0> and derive your test case classes from that class. This is one of the easiest ways to extend PHPUnit.
将自定义的断言和工具方法写在 <l0>PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase</l0> 的一个抽象子类中，然后从这个抽象子类派生你的测试用例类。这是扩展 PHPUnit 的最容易的方法。
Writing Tests for PHPUnit
编写 PHPUnit 测试
XML Configuration
XML Configuration （XML 配置）
XML DataSet
XML DataSet （XML 数据集）
Xdebug
Xdebug

Xdebug is not distributed as part of PHPUnit. If you receive a notice while running tests that the Xdebug extension is not loaded, it means that Xdebug is either not installed or not configured properly. Before you can use the code coverage analysis features in PHPUnit, you should read <u0>the Xdebug installation guide</u0>.
Xdebug 不随 PHPUnit 分发。如果在运行测试时收到了 Xdebug 扩展未加载的提示，就意味着 Xdebug 未安装或者未正确配置。在使用 PHPUnit 的代码覆盖率分析功能之前，需要阅读下 <u0>Xdebug 安装指南</u0>。
YAML DataSet
YAML DataSet （YAML 数据集）
You can also assert the result of complex queries with the Query Table approach, just specify a result name with a query and compare it to a dataset:
利用 QueryTable，也可以对复杂查询的结果作出断言，只需要指定查询以及结果名称，并随后将其与某个数据集进行比较：
You can also immediately use the PHAR after you have downloaded it, of course:
当然，也可以下载后直接使用这个 PHAR：
You can also use the approach shown in <x0/> to test exceptions.
可以用 <x0/> 中所示方法来对异常进行测试。

You can always write more tests. However, you will quickly find that only a fraction of the tests you can imagine are actually useful. What you want is to write tests that fail even though you think they should work, or tests that succeed even though you think they should fail. Another way to think of it is in cost/benefit terms. You want to write tests that will pay you back with information.
你总能编写更多测试。但是很快就会发现，在所有想得出来的测试中只有很小一部分是真正有用的。需要编写的是那些觉得能运作但却失败或觉得必将失败但却成功的测试。另外一种思考方式是从成本/收益的关系上去考量。需要编写的是能够给出反馈信息的测试。
You can construct the DataSet on your own:
也可以自行构造数据集：
You can create a CSV DataSet by calling:
可以这样创建 CSV DataSet：
You can create a flat xml dataset instance from within your Database TestCase by calling the <l0>createFlatXmlDataSet($filename)</l0> method:
可以在数据库 TestCase 中调用 <l0>createFlatXmlDataSet($filename)</l0> 方法来创建 Flat XML Dataset 实例：
You can create a xml dataset instance from within your Database TestCase by calling the <l0>createXmlDataSet($filename)</l0> method:
可以在数据库 TestCase 中调用 <l0>createXmlDataSet($filename)</l0> 方法来创建 XML DataSet 实例：

You can either create a dataset for the complete database as shown in <l0>testGuestbook()</l0>, or restrict it to a set of specified table names with a whitelist as shown in <l1>testFilteredGuestbook()</l1> method.
可以像 <l0>testGuestbook()</l0> 中那样创建整个数据库所对应的 DataSet，或者像 <l1>testFilteredGuestbook()</l1> 方法中那样用一个白名单来将 DataSet 限制在若干表名的集合上。
You can hold your impulse in check by doing the following:
下列操作可以帮你压住冲动：
You can make use of this by specifying arbitrary queries for your tables, for example restricting rows, column or adding <l0>ORDER BY</l0> clauses:
可以在这种用法中为你的表任意指定查询，例如限定行、列，或者加上 <l0>ORDER BY</l0> 子句：
You can provide a blacklist of static attributes that are to be excluded from the backup and restore operations:
可以提供黑名单来将静态属性从备份与还原操作中排除出去：

You can run each test using a set of browsers: Instead of using <l0>setBrowser()</l0> to set up one browser you declare a <l1>public static</l1> array named <l2>$browsers</l2> in your test case class. Each item in this array describes one browser configuration. Each of these browsers can be hosted by different Selenium Server servers. <x3/> shows an example.
可以对每个测试都用一组浏览器运行：不要用 <l0>setBrowser()</l0> 来设定单个浏览器，而是在测试用例类里声明一个名称为<l2>$browsers</l2> 的 <l1>public static</l1> 数组。这个数组里的每个项目都描述了一个浏览器配置。这些浏览器可以各自由不同的 Selenium Server 服务器承载。<x3/> 展示了例子。
You can use <l0>@assert</l0> annotation in the documentation block of a method to automatically generate simple, yet meaningful tests instead of incomplete test cases. <x1/> shows an example.
可以在方法的文档注释块中使用 <l0>@assert</l0> 标注来让生成器自动生成简单却有意义的测试而非不完整的测试用例。<x1/>展示了一个范例：

You can use PHPUnit to write tests once you are done programming. However, the sooner a test is written after an error has been introduced, the more valuable the test is. So instead of writing tests months after the code is "complete", we can write tests days or hours or minutes after the possible introduction of a defect. Why stop there? Why not write the tests a little before the possible introduction of a defect?
可以在编程完成之后再用 PHPUnit 来编写测试。然而，在引入错误之后尽早编写测试其价值就更高。因此，与其在编码“完成”之后若干个月才编写测试，不如在可能引入缺陷之后几天、几小时甚至几分钟之内就编写测试。到此为止吗？为何不在可能引入缺陷之前就编写测试呢？

You can use a <e0>mock object</e0> "as an observation point that is used to verify the indirect outputs of the SUT as it is exercised. Typically, the mock object also includes the functionality of a test stub in that it must return values to the SUT if it hasn't already failed the tests but the emphasis is on the verification of the indirect outputs. Therefore, a mock object is a lot more than just a test stub plus assertions; it is used in a fundamentally different way" (Gerard Meszaros).
可以用 <e0>仿件对象(mock object)</e0>“作为观察点来核实被测试系统在测试中的间接输出。通常，仿件对象还需要包括桩件的功能，因为如果测试尚未失败则仿件对象需要向被测系统返回一些值，但是其重点还是在对间接输出的核实上。因此，仿件对象远不止是桩件加断言，它是以一种从根本上完全不同的方式来使用的”(Gerard Meszaros)。

You can use a <e0>mock object</e0> "as an observation point that is used to verify the indirect outputs of the SUT as it is exercised. Typically, the mock object also includes the functionality of a test stub in that it must return values to the SUT if it hasn't already failed the tests but the emphasis is on the verification of the indirect outputs. Therefore, a mock object is lot more than just a test stub plus assertions; it is used a fundamentally different way".
可以用 <e0>仿件对象(mock object)</e0>“作为观察点来核实被测试系统在测试中的间接输出。通常，仿件对象还需要包括桩件的功能，因为如果测试尚未失败则仿件对象需要向被测系统返回一些值，但是其重点还是在对间接输出的核实上。因此，仿件对象远不止是桩件加断言，它是以一种从根本上完全不同的方式来使用的。”
You can use the Database (DB) DataSet from the Connection and compare it to a File-Based DataSet.
可以从自数据库连接建立数据库数据集，并将其与基于文件的数据集进行比较。
You can wrap test cases or test suites in a subclass of <l0>PHPUnit_Extensions_TestDecorator</l0> and use the Decorator design pattern to perform some actions before and after the test runs.
可以将测试用例或者测试套件包装在 <l0>PHPUnit_Extensions_TestDecorator</l0> 的子类中并运用 Decorator（修饰器）设计模式来在测试运行前后执行一些动作。
You do not want to modify considerable amount of test code for little changes in your production code.
你不希望因为生产代码的小变更而需要对测试代码进行数量可观的修改。
You may also use the downloaded PHAR file directly:
也可以直接使用下载的 PHAR 文件：
You need to setup test data in (possibly much) more than two tables to get reasonable initial data for the methods you want to test.
为了给待测方法建立合理的初始数据，需要在两个以上（可能远超过）表里设置测试数据。
You probably know this scenario from your daily work and projects, where you want to put your fresh or experienced PHPUnit skills to work and get stuck by one of the following problems:
你大概会在日常工作面对的项目中经历这一幕。你打算把你那或生疏或纯熟的 PHPUnit 技能用到工作中去，结果被以下问题之一卡住了：

You should be as specific as possible when testing exceptions. Testing for classes that are too generic might lead to undesirable side-effects. Accordingly, testing for the <l0>Exception</l0> class with <l1>@expectedException</l1> or <l2>setExpectedException()</l2> is no longer permitted.
对异常进行测试是越明确越好的。对太笼统的类进行测试有可能导致不良副作用。因此，不再允许用 <l1>@expectedException</l1> 或 <l2>setExpectedException()</l2> 对 <l0>Exception</l0> 类进行测试。
You want to be able to read and understand the test code easily, even months after writing it.
你希望在哪怕好几个月以后也能轻松地阅读并理解测试代码。
You want to use <u0>Behat</u0> for Behaviour-Driven Development instead of the <l1>PHPUnit_Extensions_Story_TestCase</l1> extension to PHPUnit that is discussed in the remainder of this chapter.
你要用 <u0>Behat</u0> 来进行行为驱动开发，而非本章其余部分所讨论的 PHPUnit 的 <l1>PHPUnit_Extensions_Story_TestCase</l1> 扩展。
You won't need additional files for assertions and can specify them directly in the TestCase.
不需要为断言提供任何额外文件，可以直接在 TestCase 中指定。
Your business logic performs a mix of SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE and DELETE statements.
业务逻辑中混合执行了 SELECT、INSERT、UPDATE 和 DELETE 语句。

shows a cut-down version of the <l0>PHPUnit_Extensions_RepeatedTest</l0> test decorator that illustrates how to write your own test decorators.
展示了测试修饰器 <l0>PHPUnit_Extensions_RepeatedTest</l0> 的一个删减版本，用以说明如何编写你自己的测试修饰器。

shows a data-driven test case class that compares values from a file with Comma-Separated Values (CSV). Each line of such a file looks like <l0>foo;bar</l0>, where the first value is the one we expect and the second value is the actual one.
展示了一个数据驱动的测试用例类，对来自 CSV 文件内的值进行比较。这个文件内的每个行看起来类似于 <l0>foo;bar</l0>，第一个值是期望值，第二个值则是实际值。
shows a simple implementation of the <l0>PHPUnit_Framework_TestListener</l0> interface.
展示了 <l0>PHPUnit_Framework_TestListener</l0> 接口的一个简单实现。

shows a test case class, <l0>DatabaseTest</l0>, that contains one test method, <l1>testConnection()</l1>. In the test case class' <l2>setUp()</l2> template method we check whether the MySQLi extension is available and use the <l3>markTestSkipped()</l3> method to skip the test if it is not.
展示了一个测试用例类 <l0>DatabaseTest</l0>，它有一个测试方法 <l1>testConnection()</l1>。在测试用例类的 <l2>setUp()</l2>模板方法中，检查了 MySQLi 扩展是否可用，并且在扩展不可用时用 <l3>markTestSkipped()</l3> 方法来跳过此测试。

shows a test case class, <l0>SampleTest</l0>, that contains one test method, <l1>testSomething()</l1>. By calling the convenience method <l2>markTestIncomplete()</l2> (which automatically raises an <l3>PHPUnit_Framework_IncompleteTestError</l3> exception) in the test method, we mark the test as being incomplete.
展示了一个测试用例类 <l0>SampleTest</l0>，它有一个测试方法 <l1>testSomething()</l1>。通过在测试方法中调用便捷方法 <l2>markTestIncomplete()</l2>（会自动抛出一个 <l3>PHPUnit_Framework_IncompleteTestError</l3> 异常）将这个测试标记为未完成。
shows all the varieties of assertions.
shows all the varieties of assertions.
shows an example of how to use the Mock Builder's fluent interface to configure the creation of the test double.
这个例子展示了如何用仿件生成器的流畅式接口来配置测试替身的生成。

shows an excerpt from a Code Coverage report. Lines of code that were executed while running the tests are highlighted green, lines of code that are executable but were not executed are highlighted red, and "dead code" is highlighted grey. The number left to the actual line of code indicates how many tests cover that line.
是代码覆盖率报告的摘录。测试运行时被执行到的代码行高亮标为绿色，可执行但是未被执行到的代码行标为红色，“死代码”标为灰色。代码行左边的数字表明有多少测试覆盖了此行。
shows how <l0>PHPUnit_Framework_Constraint_IsTrue</l0> extends the abstract base class for matcher objects (or constraints), <l1>PHPUnit_Framework_Constraint</l1>.
展示了 <l0>PHPUnit_Framework_Constraint_IsTrue</l0> 是如何扩展针对匹配器对象（或约束）的抽象基类 <l1>PHPUnit_Framework_Constraint</l1> 的。
shows how <l0>getMockFromWsdl()</l0> can be used to stub, for example, the web service described in <f1>GoogleSearch.wsdl</f1>.
展示了如何用 <l0>getMockFromWsdl()</l0> 来对（例如）<f1>GoogleSearch.wsdl</f1> 中描述的 web 服务上桩。
shows how the above rules can be written down as specification scenarios using <l0>PHPUnit_Extensions_Story_TestCase</l0>.
展示了如何用 <l0>PHPUnit_Extensions_Story_TestCase</l0> 把上述规则写成规格脚本。

shows how to stub method calls and set up return values. We first use the <l0>getMock()</l0> method that is provided by the <l1>PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase</l1> class to set up a stub object that looks like an object of <l2>SomeClass</l2> (<x3/>). We then use the <u4>Fluent Interface</u4> that PHPUnit provides to specify the behavior for the stub. In essence, this means that you do not need to create several temporary objects and wire them together afterwards. Instead, you chain method calls as shown in the example. This leads to more readable and "fluent" code.

展示了如何对方法的调用上桩以及如何设定返回值。首先用 <l1>PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase</l1> 类提供的 <l0>getMock()</l0> 方法来建立一个桩件对象，它表面看起来像是 <l2>SomeClass</l2>类（<x3/>）的实例。随后用 PHPUnit 提供的 <u4>流畅式接口</u4>来指定桩件的行为。本质上，这意味着不需要建立多个临时对象然后再把它们捆到一起。取而代之的是范例中所示的链式方法调用。这使得代码更加易读并更加“流畅”。

shows how to stub method calls and set up return values. We first use the <l0>getMockBuilder()</l0> method that is provided by the <l1>PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase</l1> class to set up a stub object that looks like an object of <l2>SomeClass</l2> (<x3/>). We then use the <u4>Fluent Interface</u4> that PHPUnit provides to specify the behavior for the stub. In essence, this means that you do not need to create several temporary objects and wire them together afterwards. Instead, you chain method calls as shown in the example. This leads to more readable and "fluent" code.

展示了如何对方法的调用上桩以及如何设定返回值。首先用 <l1>PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase</l1> 类提供的 <l0>getMockBuilder()</l0> 方法来建立一个桩件对象，它表面看起来像是 <l2>SomeClass</l2>类（<x3/>）的实例。随后用 PHPUnit 提供的 <u4>流畅式接口</u4>来指定桩件的行为。本质上，这意味着不需要建立多个临时对象然后再把它们捆到一起。取而代之的是范例中所示的链式方法调用。这使得代码更加易读并更加“流畅”。

shows how to subclass the <l0>PHPUnit_Framework_BaseTestListener</l0> abstract class, which lets you specify only the interface methods that are interesting for your use case, while providing empty implementations for all the others.
展示了如何从抽象类 <l0>PHPUnit_Framework_BaseTestListener</l0> 派生子类，这个抽象类为所有接口方法提供了空白实现，这样你就只需要指定那些在你的使用情境下有意义的接口方法。
shows how to test the contents of the <l0><title></l0> element of the <s1>http://www.example.com/</s1> website.

展示了如何用仿件对象来测试 <l0>Subject</l0> 和 <l1>Observer</l1> 对象之间的互动。

shows how to use the <l0>@expectedException</l0> annotation to test whether an exception is thrown inside the tested code.

shows how to use the <l0>expectOutputString()</l0> method to set the expected output. If this expected output is not generated, the test will be counted as a failure.
展示了如何用 <l0>expectOutputString()</l0> 方法来设定所预期的输出。如果没有产生预期的输出，测试将计为失败。

展示了如何在对与文件系统交互的类进行的测试中使用 vfsStream 来模仿文件系统。

to keep track of the tests that you have to write. The problem with empty test methods is that they are interpreted as a success by the PHPUnit framework. This misinterpretation leads to the test reports being useless -- you cannot see whether a test is actually successful or just not yet implemented. Calling <l0>$this->fail()</l0> in the unimplemented test method does not help either, since then the test will be interpreted as a failure. This would be just as wrong as interpreting an unimplemented test as a success.
以此来跟踪需要编写的测试。空测试的问题是 PHPUnit 框架会将它们解读为成功。这种错误解读导致错误报告变得毫无用处——无法分辨出测试是真的成功了还是根本就未编写实现。在未实现的测试中调用 <l0>$this->fail()</l0> 同样没啥帮助，因为测试将被解读为失败。这和将未实现的测试解读为成功是一样的错误。

uses the <l0>setUpBeforeClass()</l0> and <l1>tearDownAfterClass()</l1> template methods to connect to the database before the test case class' first test and to disconnect from the database after the last test of the test case, respectively.

tu.prop: We now factor out the comparison of expected and actual values into a function that raises an Exception when there is a discrepancy (<x0/>). This gives us two benefits: the writing of tests becomes easier and we only get output when something is wrong.

tuv.seg: Assertions
Assertions （断言）

tu.prop: When you realize that it's all about specifying behaviour and not writing tests, your point of view shifts. Suddenly the idea of having a Test class for each of your production classes is ridiculously limiting. And the thought of testing each of your methods with its own test method (in a 1-1 relationship) will be laughable.

tuv.seg: Behaviour-Driven Development
Behaviour-Driven Development （行为驱动开发）

tu.prop: PHPUnit can perform additional checks while it executes the tests. In addition to the fine-grained control over the various strict mode checks (see below) you may use the <l0>--strict</l0> commandline option or set <l1>strict="true"</l1> in PHPUnit's XML configuration file to enable all of them.

tu.prop: Unit Tests are primarily written as a good practice to help developers identify and fix bugs, to refactor code and to serve as documentation for a unit of software under test. To achieve these benefits, unit tests ideally should cover all the possible paths in a program. One unit test usually covers one specific path in one function or method. However a test method is not necessary an encapsulated, independent entity. Often there are implicit dependencies between test methods, hidden in the implementation scenario of a test.

PHPUnit supports the declaration of explicit dependencies between test methods. Such dependencies do not define the order in which the test methods are to be executed but they allow the returning of an instance of the test fixture by a producer and passing it to the dependent consumers.

tuv.seg: Test Dependencies
Test Dependencies （测试的依赖关系）
